x1a[1]1(brgyad stong): byel byar bya bam ba mos te/ de ltar myi ma yin pa de 'dud kyi khyim gyi rnams kyis 'brel bar 'gyur ro// de las byang chu bya sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di sam du
x1a[1]2(brgyad stong): ngo su du / di 'dud kyi mthun yi pa di dag 'byer ro sam du ma mas sa// de btsun pa de cas zhig khyong ra 'gyur te/ ma'i gyi rje
x1a[1]3(brgyad stong): chul sems dpa' gan dag sa brnyag par byed/ 'byal 'di thepe slang byed// smad cing gzhu ba byed par 'gyur te/ pani sdom gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
x1a[1]4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis / bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung la sta na to zhenas/ de tsam gyis phyi phyir nga rgyal skyed par 'gyur
x1a[1]5(brgyad stong): rgyal yang dag par skyed par 'gyur/ nga rgyal 'phel ma byed pa 'i 'gyur/ nga rgyal yang dag par 'phel bar byadad par 'gyur/ nga rgyal ston par byed par 'gyur// nga rgyas
x1a[1]6(brgyad stong): ston par byed par 'gyur/ brgyal rgyas par byed phyi 'gyur/ nga rgyal nye bar rgyas par byed par 'gyur shing rgyal 'brung 'a byed par 'gyur ro// de brgyal dang / skrag pa'i nga rgyal dang / brgya
x1a[1]7(brgyad stong): Akyang brdul da/ mngon pa'i nga rgyas dang / ldog pa'i dargyal dus thams cad la khye dang pa nyid rgya pyod pa 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi ye zhes bla myed pa dung/ grwa byung kyi sa da/ 
x1a[1]8(brgyad stong): kyid pa ma bla ma med pa rgya ring du byed par 'gyur ro// za ma byed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rgya me du byed par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i tshul gyi mi dge pa'i man
2a1(brgyad stong): a ra a shwA sa ha si ka pa da nya pa ra mi ta// bi da skad du
2a2(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brgyad stong pa// bam po thog ma
2a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / ra
2a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
2b1(brgyad stong): cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i kho ba na/ bya rgod phung po'i r-i la/ dga'/ 
2b2(brgyad stong): slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'ang
2b3(brgyad stong): bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dag bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs
2b4(brgyad stong): pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shi nad tu rnam par
3a1(brgyad stong): rib shin tu rnam par grol dang / cang shes pa/ glang po chen pa/ 
3a2(brgyad stong): byas pa byed pa byas pa/ khur bar bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ sred/ 
3a3(brgyad stong): pa kun tu sbyor ba yang sa su zad pa/ yang dag par shes pas/ sems
3a4(brgyad stong): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
3b1(brgyad stong): thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma rtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
3b2(brgyad stong): rnas bamam ldan 'das kyitshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor das bka' sdem nga / 
3b3(brgyad stong): 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dzin po rnams kyi/ shes
3b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams ste/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 
4a1(brgyad stong): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyod slobs
4a2(brgyad stong): gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di snyam du sems te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di bdag rang gi shes ra
4a3(brgyad stong): phyin pa ston par 'gyur da te se rgyas kyis dus ston par 'thar stsa pa dang / de las rgyas kyi
4a4(brgyad stong): medang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan dan ri'i bu'i de wA bur/ kyi rtog pa de sems kyis she
4b1(brgyad stong): dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'chad pa dang / rab tu ston pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu' yin par rig par bya'o// de'i
4b2(brgyad stong): phyirang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa'i chos bstan pa de la bslabs nas/ de dgra chos nyid de mngon sum du byed do// chos kyi
4b3(brgyad stong): mngon gsum du byas nas/ gang ci smra ba dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / 'chang pa dang / rab tu ston pa de dag 'ams cad chos nyid dang me 'gas
4b4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de dag 'di ltar chos nyid de ston pa rnams/ chos nyid dang mi 'ag la ba de yang / de bzhin gshegs pas chos
4b5(brgyad stong): bstan pa'i rgyu mthun pa'o// de dag nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang btso
4b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtsams te/ ci nas byang chub ses/ 
5a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyod spobs par byos shig ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom
5a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags
5a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ byang chub ses
5a4(brgyad stong): dpa'i chos kyang bdag gis mi 'tshal// ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal/ ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // byang
5a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' gang zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang gal te 'di ltar bshad cing bstan pa la/ byang chub sems
5a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems/ mi zhum/ mi 'gong ste/ de'i yid phyogs par mi bgyid/ mi skrag mi dadang / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
5a7(brgyad stong): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa lags so// de nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu
5a8(brgyad stong): phyin pa la gdams pa lags so// gal te/ de ltar gnas na/ de nyid gdams pa dang / bstan pa lags so// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen // 
5b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skems pas ji ltar bslabs na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems des kyang rlom sems mi bgyid pa de ltar bslab par bgyi'o// 
5b2(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
5b3(brgyad stong): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 
5b4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ci sems med pa gang yin pa de la yod pa 'am/ med pa dmigs sam/ yod dam sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de ni med do// rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang
5b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la yod pa 'am/ med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ gang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad du/ sems gang med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer ba khyod kyi sa rgal
5b6(brgyad stong): ba de da rung ngam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byorade sems med pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 
5b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems med pa de ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khod kyi
5b8(brgyad stong): ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
6a1(brgyad stong): chub ni sems las phyir mi ldog par rtag par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi se la slob par
6a2(brgyad stong): 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// 
6a3(brgyad stong): rnal 'byer du bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya'o// shes rab kyi
6a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o/ rnas 'byor tu bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyon par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcing du
6a5(brgyad stong): byasdug par bya/ kun chub par byer/ shes rab kyi pa bang tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sang sa rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su slob pa'i phyir/ rnam 'byor du byor
6a6(brgyad stong): la phyin pa la la khyo la sa rgya kyis surdokhro po'i
6b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'byord du bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da kyis 'di skad ces gsol to
6b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di nyid bdag gis byang chub ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dge bar rjes su ma mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom
6b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das bdag gis byed chub sems dpa'i ming de yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub ses
6b4(brgyad stong): dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdas shing bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis byang chub
6b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' zhes 'du ba dang 'jig par bgyid pa ni bdag gi glo ba la gcags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ming de ma gnas shing / maM ga/ nas pa la yang ma lags la/ rnam par mi gnas pa yang
6b6(brgyad stong): mA lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming tsam gyis ma mchis pa'i slad du/ ming de mi gnas shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la/ rnam par mi gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
6b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa zab mo bshad pa la gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ma zhum ma gong / yi ma bsad yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ mi skrag mi dang / dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / lhag
6b8(brgyad stong): bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i tshus/ 
7a1(brgyad stong): gyis legs par gnas so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgoms pas/ 
7a2(brgyad stong): gzugs la gnas par mi bgyid ste/ tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la ma lags/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gzugs la gan
7a3(brgyad stong): na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ 
7a4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'du bya/ de rnams la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
7a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'du byed rnams la spyad na/ shes radra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ sa
7a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa ma lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na/ yongs su mi gzung ba gzung bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur
7a7(brgyad stong): dri ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzugs yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yon/ 
7a8(brgyad stong): gzung bram mchis so// / gzugs yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags kyi/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags parjod / rnam par shes pa yongs su 'azung po
7b1(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7b2(brgyad stong): 'dri la spyad par bgyi'o// kye'adi la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// yangs pa mdun du ma bgyis pa/ tshad ma nges pa cwa nyan thos
7b3(brgyad stong): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mang ma lags pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis te/ mtshan mar gzung ba ma lags so// gal te mtshan mar gzung bar gyur na/ kun
7b4(brgyad stong): tu rgyu sde can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ kun tu rgyu sde can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di nyid la mos nas/ dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing / phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhus so// de zhugs
7b5(brgyad stong): nus kyang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags/ de bzhin du 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la malags/ rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin tig
7b6(brgyad stong): de la shes pa de dga' ba dang / bde bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang na yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol na yang dag par rjes su mi mtho
7b7(brgyad stong): shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de gzugs las gzhan na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
7b8(brgyad stong): kyi nang dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / nas pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang yang dag par rjesu
8a1(brgyad stong): mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu sde can mos so// de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la thams cad du dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing / chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te mos pa zhes bgyi'o// 
8a2(brgyad stong): des chos gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo // gang gzung ba 'am gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma dmigs so// de mya ngan las 'da' bar yang rlom sems su mi bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bya
8a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs gang lags pa yang yongs su mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / 
8a4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa gang lags pa'ang yongs su mi 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad rnams yong su ma rdzogs par bar mdor lo
8a5(brgyad stong): mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa'
8a6(brgyad stong): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis la spyod cing / te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skems pas/ 'di ltar rtag cing 'di ltar bsams te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ 
8a7(brgyad stong): gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin pa 'di gang gi yin/ ci chos gang med pa dang / mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes/ gal te de ltar brtags/ de ltar bsams na/ ma zhum ma gong
8a8(brgyad stong): yi mi gsod/ yid gsod par mi bgyid de'i mid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ pi skrag mi dngang nga bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen gyi shes rab kyi pha rabs tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig
8b1(brgyad stong): / 'du bye rnams dang/ de bzhin du nam pa shesas su nas rdzogs pa po 'od dang zab / nga kyi yo rkye da
8b2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bams cad ma khye pa'i ba nyid dang bris pa yin na/ ci phyir byang chub sems pa sems du 'dren pos shes rab kyi sa rom tu byin lesam thas par smin bya/ den sa smras par
8b3(brgyad stong): de sngon du pa dang // 'dubyed mas / de bzhin durnam 'gyes pa nyid kya tshe dang ldan pag mad / nga 'dus na
9a1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la slob
9a2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu chos thams cad ni ma byung ma skyes pa ste/ de ltar spyod na tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub seMs
9a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin no// yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye
9a4(brgyad stong): ba yin no// gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtsams te/ 'di skad ces smras so// gal te gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi
9a5(brgyad stong): mtshan ma la spyod na mtshan mu la skyed do// gal te gzugs mtshan ma med pa'o snya/ du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ gal te gzugs 'byung ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'gag pa/ 
9a6(brgyad stong): la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan mi lo spyod do// gal te gzugs snang ba'i snyam du spyod namam na ma la spyod de/ bdag spyod do snyam na mtshan ma la spyod / 
9a7(brgyad stong): bdag byang chub sems dpa' snyam na dmigs pa la spyod do// de bzhin du ga te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// gas te rnam par chen sa pa ma
9a8(brgyad stong): mal spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do/ ga gal te rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ gci ti rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la spyod na mtshan ma po spyong // gab te rnam par shes pa 'gag pa ldan
9b1(brgyad stong): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// bdag spyod do snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// 
9b2(brgyad stong): bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na dmigs pa la spyod do// g.yete 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ snyam du sems na/ mtshan po la sbyong ngo / byang chub sems dpo 'di
9b3(brgyad stong): ni thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po ci ltar spyod na/ shes
9b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / me dang ldan/ pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad cesasmras so// gal te gzugs la mi spyod na gzugs kyi mtshan
9b5(brgyad stong): ma la mi spyod do// gzugs mtshan ma med pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs 'byung ba la mi spyod/ gzugs 'gag pa la mi spyod/ gzugs jig pa la mi spyod/ gzugs stong pa'i snyam du mi spyod/ 
9b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin du gal te tshor po ma ma yin/ 'du shes sa ma yin/ 'du byed rnamos pa ma yin/ ga'i rnam par shes pas mi spyod na/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid sa mi spyod/ rnam sa khrigs pa mtshan ma med pa
9b7(brgyad stong): du mi spyod / rnam par shes pa 'byung ba la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa 'gag pa la mi spyod / rnam par shes pa 'jig pa la mi spyod / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i snyam du mi spyod de/ byang chub ses dpa' sa
9b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rim tu phyin pa la spyod do// de spyod kyang spyod snyam du nye bar mi 'gro/ spyad par bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi 'gro/ spyod kyang spyod pa mi spyod kyong mo spyod snyam du ya
10a1(brgyad stong): bar mi gro/ spyod pa nyid kyang ma yin pa/ mi sbyong pa nyid kyang ma yin pa snya dunye bar mi sngo/ spyad par bya'o/ dus nye phyir myi 'gro/ spyong pa sa bya ba la/ ji smad pas
10a2(brgyad stong): snyam du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// spyod par bya ba nyid kyang ma yin la/ mi smad par bya ba yang ma yin pa snyam du nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhen chos thams cad ni rjes su so tha ru ma thong ba mo sbas pa
10a3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad lon pa med pa zhes bya ste/ yangs pa mdun du ma byas pa/ tshod ma nges pa/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs/ 
10a4(brgyad stong): gnas brtan tshe dang ldan parab 'byor kyis de nad ces gsas te// bcom ldan 'das gang ting nge 'dzin 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems // pa'i sems po'i chen bye don/ de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs
10a5(brgyad stong): ba dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rung bstan te/ na ting nge 'dzin de yang yang dag par rjes su mo mthong / ting ngeb
10a6(brgyad stong): des kyang rje sems su mi rjid de/ bya zhe par gnas 'dzin de mas pa chug no// bdag tid 'dzin de la ma yang gnan / yo
10a7(brgyad stong): shugs pa'o// snyam pa de lta bu de la yong se ma mchis// de skad cig gsol pa dang / me dang ldan pa pa'i'i dus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sa 'din ces rnaMs/ ched ldan ma tha byer ci dzin
10b1(brgyad stong): gang la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o// 
10b2(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin de bstan du rung ngam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes so// shA ri'i nus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
10b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu mi shes yang dag par mi shes zhes zer ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de med pas na/ mi shes
10b4(brgyad stong): yang dag par mi shes so// ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la le gas so zhes bya ba byin no// 'di ltar khyod sangs rgyas kyi mthus slongs/ 
10b5(brgyad stong): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis ston pa legs so legaso ya de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin du 'di la bslab par bya'o// 
10b6(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta ra slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
10b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyang chub soms dpa sems dpa' chen po dkyar smrab na/ shebar kyi sa ris tu phyin pa la grib pa sags sas/ dri sa ces gcos nga/ 'ico rgyan nyis kyimi midang ldan pa / 
10b8(brgyad stong): tshul 'di gad cem pagar gyu to// yo sa byang chub sems da 'a sems dpa' chen gyi ra ban/ sa rab kyi sa ma tu byen pas tho pa yid no// sa ga
11a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa chos gang la slob/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang
11a2(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni/ chos gang la yang mi slob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos de dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo ji ltar mngon par tshugs pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// 
11a3(brgyad stong): sha ri'i lus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na de ji lta bur mchis/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar yod pa de bzhin yod de/ de ltar med pa de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// de dag la byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa
11a4(brgyad stong): rang mi ldan pa rnams mngon par chags te/ de dag gis chos thams cad med pa la brtags so// de dag gis rtags nas/ da mtha' gnyis la zhen pas/ chos de dag mi shes mi mthong ste
11a5(brgyad stong): de'i phyir chos thams cad la rtog go// rtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon par chags te/ de'i gzhis dmigs pa la sa/ nas nas 'das pa'i chos la rtog go// ma 'ongs pa'i chos
11a6(brgyad stong): ma rtog go// da ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go// de dag gis brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pas/ de dag gis med pa'i chos thams cad la brtags so// de dag gis med pa'i chos de
11a7(brgyad stong): ngag thams cad la brtags pas/ lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo // lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum nas nges par mi 'byung / yang dag pa'i/ 
11a8(brgyad stong): mthar khong du ni chud de/ de'i phyir de dag byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de dag chos bden pa la mapa yid mi ches so// yang gari'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sis rnapa' chen po rnams ni
11b1(brgyad stong): gang ma yang mngon par zhen par mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob d+ha
11b2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dro ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang mi slong ste/ ri
11b3(brgyad stong): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ chos thams cad la slob bo/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' tshang sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob
11b4(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsos to// bcom ldan 'das grang zhin
11b5(brgyad stong): 'di skad du/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slo'i par 'gyur ram/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye du yi na nam/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 
11b6(brgyad stong): zhes de skad du 'dri na bcom ldan 'das de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ros du
11b7(brgyad stong): na 'dir khyod nyid la dri bar bya mis khyod kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du ston cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa / 
11b8(brgyad stong): bco ldan 'das kyis 'ad rgo ces bkar stsal te/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyum de gzhan la gzugs de gzhan nam/ sgyus de gzhan latshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed de dag kunan naman
12a1(brgyad stong): sgyu ma de gzhan la/ rnam par shes pa de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan lnga/ gzugs de gzhan me lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid
12a2(brgyad stong): skyo ma lags so// sgyu ma nyid gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed de dag gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das skyes de gzhan sa rnam
12a3(brgyad stong): shes pa yang gzhan ma legs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma lags so// sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa sogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma/ 
12a4(brgyad stong): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems zhes bya ba 'di ni 'du shes kun shes pa rtags pa tha snyad yin no/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
12a5(brgyad stong): chub 'byor kyis 'di skad ces pa gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad sa byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa des/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bla na med pa yang dag
12a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur bzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zho na
12a7(brgyad stong): ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bur gsungs te/ gzugs gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang / phyung po lnga po de dag lags te/ de bzhin du tshor po dang / 'du shes dang / 
12a8(brgyad stong): byed rnams kyang / sgyu ma lta bu'o// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bu'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ne/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa ni yang dbang po drug dang
12b1(brgyad stong): lnga po de dag lags na/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan pa 'di thos nas/ skrag cing dngangs pa dang shin tu dngangs par mi 'gyur
12b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ca kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sdig pa'i grogs po'i lug tu song bar gyur na ni skrag ce
12b3(brgyad stong): ga dang / shin tu dngangs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshos gnyen gyi lag tu song bar gyur na ni/ mi skrag mi dang pa shin tu dang
12b4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bco/ ma ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
12b5(brgyad stong): chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang rnams lags par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ston cing 'dems pa dang / gang de
12b6(brgyad stong): da kyi nyes pa ni 'di ltar rig par bya/ bdud kyinyis pa ni 'di dag 'an/ da kyices ni 'di dag yin par rig pa / bdud kyilas ni 'di dogartogs nas spang bar byabyon nas ban kyi
12b7(brgyad stong): ston pa 'di dag ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rdzas su rig par bya
12b8(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsam pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis thaMd skang du 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sem sa dab rjo kyi
13a1(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
13a2(brgyad stong): ga lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams
13a3(brgyad stong): chags pa med pa la slob bo// sha rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad ma chags pa/ khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
13a4(brgyad stong): tu mngon par mtshang mi rgya ste/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi don gyi sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
13a5(brgyad stong): gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe sa bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
13a6(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris chen po'i rtse bo byed par 'gyur ba na// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la
13a7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
13a8(brgyad stong): rasha ri'i bu da de'i dus la zab par shes na spobs par byos shig / sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog du lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par
13b1(brgyad stong): ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la stsogs pa'i lta ba de dag spang ba'i slad du/ chos bstan to snyam pas na don de'i slad du/ 
13b2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du/ byang chub ses dpa'/ 
13b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po/ zhes bgyi ba spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na/ spobs par byos shig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
13b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom lda na 'das gang byang chub kyi sems de yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa med pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
13b5(brgyad stong): cad dang / thun mongs ma lags pa'i sems kyis mi mnyam pa'i so sa te da te sems de la yang ma chags yongs su mi zin to// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni zag pa ma mchis
13b6(brgyad stong): pas yongs su su zin to// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de yang bag be ma suchis shing / yongs su sa zin te/ sems de la ma chags shing yongs su ma zin pas na/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ses dag
13b7(brgyad stong): chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir sems de la ma chags shing yongs su mamu zin/ rab 'byor
13b8(brgyad stong): kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang ma nags shing yongs su ma zin to// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci sems gang seMs med pa'i sems yod dam/ 
14a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ci sems med pa de ma yod pa 'am med pa zhes bya ba yod dam/ dmigs sam/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta ma/ 
14a2(brgyad stong): yin no// sa rgya gyi sa pagasarab 'byor kyis smras pa/ nga tshe dang ldan lasha ri'i bu gal te sems med pa dril yod pa'am/ med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'di nang
14a3(brgyad stong): dudusems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa/ 
14a4(brgyad stong): ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdul gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bani nga ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ 
14a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' dege cha chen po bags pa/ sems dpa' de theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'tshal ba lags pas na de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangasu
14a6(brgyad stong): mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bgyi nabacom ldan 'das kyi tsam gyis na/ 
14a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa dang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal de pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po 'di sna du bdag gis seMs can dubag tu med pa/ 
14a8(brgyad stong): yongasu mya ngan las bzla'o// bdag gis sems can grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o// sems can de dag de ji snyen cig yongs mya ngan las bzlas kyang gang yongasu mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems cad
14b1(brgyad stong): gang yang med de lta du sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin te/ ran 'byor dper du sgyus pa' mkhas pa'am/ sgyum byed pa'i nye gnas kyis sam be che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs pan
14b2(brgyad stong): bor mngon par sprul te/ mngon par sprul nas/ skye bo'i tshitshogs chen po de mi snang bar byas na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de la chos gang yang gisod pa'am/ shi ba'am/ gshig pa 'am/ mi snang bar gyur
14b3(brgyad stong): pa yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das de ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ sems can dpag tu med pa grangs med pa/ gzhas du/ 
14b4(brgyad stong): med pa rnams yongs mya ngan las bzlas kyang / chos gang yangs mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos gang yang med do// gal te/ rang byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di de lta bur bstan pa 'di
14b5(brgyad stong): thos nas/ mi smig mi dang / shin tu dang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de go cha chen po/ bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa'
14b6(brgyad stong): 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po de ni/ go cha ma mchis bya bgos pa
14b7(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha med pa'o/ gos par rig par bya'o// de ci'i tshu
14b8(brgyad stong): zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o// sems can gang gi don dug cha bgos pa'i seMs can de dag kyang ma byas pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de skad ce
15a1(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du zhes
15a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// 
15a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 
15a4(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dade nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams pa'i bus tshe dang ldan parab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
15a5(brgyad stong): gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa ra ba 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer
15a6(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
15a7(brgyad stong): dang/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba
15a8(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams gang yin/ rnam par shes pa gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnaMs gang yin/ 
15b1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa ma gang ma bcings gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid
15b2(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/ de skad ces spras pa ra
15b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol bu'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang
15b4(brgyad stong): sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams pherje gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes bkrang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po rgyu/ 
15b5(brgyad stong): ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes pa kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i
15b6(brgyad stong): me dang ldan pa gang po rnam par shes par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den mi bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa mo yin pas nas bcings ma grol bar/ dben pas nam bcing se mgron
15b7(brgyad stong): sa skyes byas nas bses ma thol pa ni/ 'din byang chub sems dpa' ses pa chen po yig po chen po yang dag par zhugs pa'i gro ma med pa'o// de na ces smras du dang / tshedang ldan pa dang / 
15b8(brgyad stong): po byams ma'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po go mchen
16a1(brgyad stong): bgos pas/ theg pa chen po de la yang dag par zhugs shing / theg pa chen po yang dag par 'tshal ba lags/ thog pa chen po de gang lags/ gang du yang dag par zhugs/ theg pa chen po de gang / 
16a2(brgyad stong): du gnas par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po de gang nas gnas par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po de gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
16a3(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni dpag tu med pa'i tshig bla dag so// rab 'byor dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang 'di skad
16a4(brgyad stong): du theg pa chen po gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/ khams gsum las nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sgrib ma med pa ga la ba der yang dag par zhugs shing / thas cad
16a5(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen po de sa gang yang nges par ma byung / nges par mi 'byung / nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nges par 'gyur
16a6(brgyad stong): ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i chos de gnyi ka yang med cing mi dmigs te/ de ltar na chos rnams med cing mi dmigs pa la chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
16a7(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi bu ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang
16a8(brgyad stong): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// na mkha' mtha' yas pas na theg pa chen po ste/ ji ltar na na mkha' la sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu
16b1(brgyad stong): samatshas pa gagabs mchis pa de bzhid du/ bcom ldan 'as chen pa can thos sa spya blangs kyi mchis dpagatus mams pa skangs mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnas
16b2(brgyad stong): sa 'din byang chub sems dpa sems dpa sa po rnam mag par tha/ ngasa'ang ba yang das 'dis sa par babyung bar 'gyur ba yang ma ga sa rim ma
16b3(brgyad stong): ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar theg pa chen po sa sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs pa daphyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po me dus gsum du
16b4(brgyad stong): mnyam pa'o// de bas na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de na des bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 'das kyis tshe dang dran pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsol to// rab 'byor legs so se
16b5(brgyad stong): so// de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa che mtho'o/ yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i
16b6(brgyad stong): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas gtan rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du gsol ba btab pas/ 'di yang theg pa chen po bshad par sems so// de nas
16b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan pa rab 'byor 'dis kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po ston par mi 'gyur lags grang
16b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lha ma yin te/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjes su mthun par ston rto// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
17a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar mi mchil/ byang chub sems dpa'
17a2(brgyad stong): phyi ma'i mnyar yang nye bar mi mchil byang chub sems dpa' dbus su yang nye bar mi 'chilanade ci'i slad du zhe na/ nye bar mi mchi' zhes bgyi ba ni/ gzugs su ma mchis pas na/ byang chub sems
17a3(brgyad stong): pa la me ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis pa
17a4(brgyad stong): rig par 'gyi zugs kyi nub sems dang rlothos kyi bar mim 'di sa mi ma chis mi dmigs pa/ de bzhin du danod pa sa shes pa rudu byed rnams dang / rna
17a5(brgyad stong): par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar mi mchi' ste/ 'di ya/ nga ma mchis mi dmigaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' khrong ye mi dmigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das
17a6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par rje su mi mthong mi dmigs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par/ 
17a7(brgyad stong): rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos de yong ye yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs na/ chos gang zhig rlom gas chos gang la gdams shing bstan par
17a8(brgyad stong): bgyil bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di yang mi tsam mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes khe gyis
17b1(brgyad stong): 'dras du ma byam ste/ de ltar bdag gis bgyi bdag shin tu mngon paras grub pa de bzhin du/ chos rnams ngabanyings mchis pa gang / bzung du ma mtshas pa'i mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang ma
17b2(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed de gang lags/ gang bzung du ma mchis pa'i mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag gi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa de ni mngon par
17b3(brgyad stong): ma grub pa'o ka gang chos rnams kyi mngon par ma grub pa de ni chos ma lags/ ci shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par ma grub pas/ mngon par ma grub pa la gdams shing bstan par bgyi 'am/ 
17b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'angs mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad nga rid ma/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ byang chub tu spyong pa yang mi dmigs so// gal te de ltar bshad cing bstan pa
17b5(brgyad stong): la byang chub sems dgrar sems dpa' chen po'i sems me zhu ma mi 'gong yi mi gsod/ yi gsod par mi bgyid/ da te de'i yid phyir 'iphyogs par mi bgyid// mi skrag mi rang nga shin
17b6(brgyad stong): de dbang bur ma 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dbu' chen po'i sems ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'o chen po 'din shes rab kyi pha ral
17b7(brgyad stong): byed bu me sum bcu zhes de khur rig par bgyi 'o // de me'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos 'di dag rab tu
17b8(brgyad stong): rtog ste/ de'i tshe gzugs la nye bar mi 'gro she gzugs la nye bar mi rig/ gzugs 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
18a1(brgyad stong): dang ga rnam par shes pal le bar ma gyi rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi rig/ rnam pa shes pa 'gas par yang dag par rjes sum mnatha/ de ci'i slang du zhen/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung ba ma
18a2(brgyad stong): mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags gzugs kyi 'jig pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs pa lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'dzin gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su
18a3(brgyad stong): bgyir ma mchis soka 'jig pa dang gzugs zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis sum mchis shing gnyisu 'gyir ma mchis te/ gang yang gzugs nas bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs
18a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams gang lags da pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa ni 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// rnam par
18a5(brgyad stong): shes bu'i 'dzag pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te'abyung ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa bgyi/ 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su 'gyir ma mchis te/ 
18a6(brgyad stong): 'jig pa dang rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyisasu bgyir ma mchis te/ gang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so zhes de/ 
18a7(brgyad stong): ra chos la yongs su rtog sa de'i tshe gzugs la nye bar mi 'gro/ gzugs pa nye bar mi rig gzugs 'gag pamayang dag par rjes su mi mthong / nga bzhin du char ba dag 'du shes dang / 'du byed
18a8(brgyad stong): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi 'gro/ rnam par shes pa la nye bar mi rig/ rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'byung
18b1(brgyad stong): nam mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs su lags so// gzugs kyi 'dzag pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs bgyi ba 'ad mi gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyin
18b2(brgyad stong): sa mangs so// 'dzag pa rung gzugasu sa bgyi ba 'dun gnas su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyur ma mchis to/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di na gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs sa
18b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ 'byung ba ma
18b4(brgyad stong): mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// 'jig pa dang rnam par shes ba zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma
18b5(brgyad stong): mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyi// shes su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so/ 
18b6(brgyad stong): bam po// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// de'i phyir
18b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis ji ltar bshad pa'i don kho bos shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' yang 'byung ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba med pa yin no// byang chu
18b8(brgyad stong): sems dka' ba'i spyod pa ci'i phyir spyod/ sems can rnams kyi phyir sdug bsngal gang yod pa de dag bzod par byed cing myong bar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa/ dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
19a1(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/ gang dka' bar byed pas 'du shes pas spyod pa
19a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dra ba' ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i du bde bar 'du shes blang byas shing / sems can thams cad lo mar 'du shes pa dang / par 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa nga
19a3(brgyad stong): bu mer 'du shes byas pa ma gtogs par sems can grangs med phra brag tu med pa'i don bya bar mi nus so// de ltar skyes pa dang / bud med dag la 'du shes byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang
19a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / byar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor lud shes pa/ 
19a5(brgyad stong): skyed par bya'o// bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// ji ltar bdag yod ye sdug bsngal thams cad las thar pa/ phyir bya ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad la yang 'du shesu 'di ltar
19a6(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs su mi gtong ngo // sdug bsngal gi phung po dpag tu med pa las shar bar bya'o// bdag gi lus brgyar gtubs kyang chung ngun/ 'di dag la bdag
19a7(brgyad stong): gis gnod sems kyang mi bskyed do snyam du/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar gnas na dka' ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no/ tshong
19a8(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub semams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi nas kyang / bdag ni yong ye med cing mi dmigs pa de lor sems bskyed par bya ste/ de bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos rnams
19b1(brgyad stong): 'du shes myur bya'o// gal te sems de ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes can du mi spyod de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung ba med pa'o zhes smras pa/ de de bzhin no// tshe dang
19b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa ga ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'byung ba med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa na mi thus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'byung ba med par/ 'on te byang chub su
19b3(brgyad stong): dpa'i chos rnams la 'byung ba med pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sen
19b4(brgyad stong): dba'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad khyen pa nyid kyi pha'i byung ba med do sha ri la bus
19b5(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba me/ dam/ 'on te thams cad khyen pa nyid kyi 'chos rnams/ 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ring
19b6(brgyad stong): bu bams cad khyen pa nyid kyi srung chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med do/ 'ibus smras pa/ me dang ldan pa rang 'byar ci thams cad mngon pa nyid kyi chos rnams nyis 'byung ba med dma'on nyes mam ston
19b7(brgyad stong): yang 'byung ba med// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ni ri'i nu so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba yang med do// sha ro'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis so'i skye bo nyid 'byung ba med dam
19b8(brgyad stong): so so'i skye bo'i rnams kyang 'byung ba med/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med do de/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe
20a1(brgyad stong): ldan darab 'byor la 'di sad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' yang 'byung ba med pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang bya med pa/ thams cad khyen pa nyid
20a2(brgyad stong): kyang 'byung ba med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med pa/ so so'i skye bo yang 'byung ba meng pa/ sa so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang 'byung ba med na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci byang chub
20a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// cha nga
20a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa shi ri'i bu ma byung ba'i chos la thob par kho bos mi 'dod de/ mngon par rtogs pa yong med do// ma byung ba ni chos kyis/ thob pa ma byung ba thol bar mi 'gyu bachen/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ma
20a5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma 'byung ba'i chos kyis thob pa ma byung ba thong / khar 'gyur ram/ 'on te 'byung ba'i sa chos kyis theb pa ma byung ba thob par 'gyur rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan/ 
20a6(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bu tsam byung ba'i chos 'byung dum/ 'on te byung ba'i chos nyid ma byung / sha ri'i zhus smos pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci 'byung ba nyid 'byung ba med pa 'am/ 'on te ma byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
20a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba med pa'i chos 'byung ba med pa'i chos shes spro bar mi slobaso// sha ri'il bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'byung ba med pa'i chos la smra bar khyo
20a8(brgyad stong): mi spobs sam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba med pa nyid smra ba yin la/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'byung ba med pa nyid spobs par byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bu byung ba med pa/ 
20b1(brgyad stong): kyang spobs pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos ston pa'i nang na mchog tu gzhag par bya tshu de ci'i phyir
20b2(brgyad stong): zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas gtan mo dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de 'i dang de nyid las 'byung bar 'gyur zhing chos nyid las mi g.yo'o// de skad ces spyad kyis spras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis
20b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyin thos mi gnas bu'i chos rnams ni de gang dang gang las dris pa de dang de nyid lus 'byung bar 'gyur zhing chos nyid las kyang 'ga'
20b4(brgyad stong): bar mi byed do// chos nyid las kyang mi 'di'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di daltar chos thams cad mi gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shi ny+tsi'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so// 
20b5(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba byin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis
20b6(brgyad stong): smras rba tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir/ the tshig pa thams cad la mi gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha ra la tu phyin pa 'di yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
20b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta bu bshad cing bstan pa la nem nur du mi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dro gnas pa 'di lta bur gnas shing yid la byed pa 'ang / 
20b8(brgyad stong): dang ma bral ba yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smos so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/ 
21a1(brgyad stong): ji ltar yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur na/ de yang de bzhin shes rab kyi
21a2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar ma 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral na/ de bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / 
21a3(brgyad stong): bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa sa bral na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur te/ des yin
21a4(brgyad stong): du zin na/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur ro// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ se thams can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gnas so// de skad
21a5(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan/ pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// sha ri'i bu leg nyes so legasol// khyod la dris te tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus don 'di nyid
21a6(brgyad stong): yang dge ba'i tshig du brjod pas yongasu bzung ngo // de ma ra zhe ma tshe dang ldan pa sha ro bu sems can ji bo nyid med pos na/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa
21a7(brgyad stong): ga ri'i bu sems can dngos po med pas na/ yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o// sems can dben pas na/ yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can/ 
21a8(brgyad stong): mngon par byang ma chub pas na/ yid la byedas kur bya'o// mngon par byang ma chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa 'di lta bu
21b1(brgyad stong): dang gnas pa 'di lta bus gnas par 'dod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ba/ rab 'byor gyi le'u ste dang po'o// 
21b2(brgyad stong): yang de'i cha lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i ris kyi bu bzhi khri dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod do// lha'i bu rnams kyi rang gi las kyi
21b3(brgyad stong): rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od ci yod pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu' dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis zil gis mnan to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
21b4(brgyad stong): byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor lnga'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'dus te/ chos bstan pa mnyan par 'dod na/ byang chub ba sems dpa' sos
21b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang mas par bgyi/ ji ltar rnal 'byor du bgyi/ sa gnas gtan rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi
21b6(brgyad stong): ce mthu' dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyir byin gyis brlabs kyis khyod la bstan par bya ste/ lha'i bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang / bla na med pa yang
21b7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o// gang yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa med de/ de ni na/ 
21b8(brgyad stong): na me de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis mtshams bcad pas yang dang yang du 'khor zhing / de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal ba med mod kyi/ 'on kyang gal te/ 
23a1(brgyad stong): ga de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu sems bskyed na/ khyang bar du ladags pa'i chos rnams sam/ ces kyang bar du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya
23a2(brgyad stong): ste/ de dag gis dge ba'i phyogs la kho bo bar chad ma byed do// de nas byang com ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// gang khyod byang chub sems
23a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro bar byed pa legs so legs so// de skad ces bka' ba dang / bcom ldan 'jos la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdas
23a4(brgyad stong): cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin bzo' bar bgyis ni ra te/ mi bzo' bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
23a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung du/ sngon byang chub sems te/ par gyur pas/ byang chub tu tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa la/ nyan thosagazhan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gtams shing rjes
23a6(brgyad stong): bstan te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad pas bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rjes su bzung bar bgyi'o// rjes su/ 
23a7(brgyad stong): bskor bar bgyi'o// yang dag par rjes su bzung bar 'gyi'o// yang dag par yongs su bskor bar bgyu'odam/ de ci'i dring du zhen/ bcom ldan 'di la 'angasag gis byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po rnaMs
23a8(brgyad stong): rjes su bzung ba dang / rjes su bskor ba dang / yang dag par yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par yongs su bskor bas/ ma bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang / 
23b1(brgyad stong): rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
23b2(brgyad stong): byas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid la gnas par bya ste
23b3(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas
23b4(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid
23b5(brgyad stong): la gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi dbya'o// de bzhin du gzugs so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba'o zhes/ 'du shes so zhes 'du byed rnams so/ 
23b6(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnas parami bya'o// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya 'o zhesade bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes
23b7(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / de bzhin du phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du sangs rgyas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ 
23b8(brgyad stong): gzugs rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs
24a1(brgyad stong): bde pa dang sdug bskul ba'i zhes gnas par ma byar/ de bzhin du tshang ba dang / 'dunan nga/ 'byed rnams rdus dang / rnam par shes pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'i zhes gnas par ma byad// gzus/ 
24a2(brgyad stong): 'dag dang bdag yang ba'i zhes gnas par sa bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs stug bu dang bri sdug pa
24a3(brgyad stong): sa gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa nas pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i zhes gnas par mi byar// gzugs spang ba 'am dmigs pa nis gams tha mo phyir
24a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'angadu byed rnams dang / rnam ra par shes pa stong pa mang migs pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tutu dgas pa'i 'bras bu 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu bye ba'o zhes gnas
24a5(brgyad stong): gyur gang bani dus sa gyung rang ngam chus zu dang/ pa' ma nas rdzum dgra bcom pa nyid dus pa byas kyig bye ba 'as gnas par ma byed / rang mangs rgyas ni
24a6(brgyad stong): 'dus pa byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par ma bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ma'is gnas par mi bya'o/ rgyun tu zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya bar gnas par ma byar// rgyun tu zhugs
24a7(brgyad stong): khe thos kyang srid pa lan bdun pa'o zhes gnas par mi byar// lan cig phyir 'ong bsrun pa'i gnas shes gnas par mi bya'o/ ga lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs su mthar ma byin pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dir lan cig byer
24a8(brgyad stong): 'ongs nas/ sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro zhes blar ma bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi byad/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan ma
24b1(brgyad stong): 'da' ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid du phung po'i lhag ma mi lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 
24b2(brgyad stong): zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma thob par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes ga/ 
24b3(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnos so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas kyang / grangs med dag tu med pa'i sems
24b4(brgyad stong): tsan rnams kyi don mdzad do// grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems rgya na yongs su mya ngan las bzlas// grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing / sangs
24b5(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas yongasu/ mya ngan las 'da'o zhes des 'di ltar yang gnas par mi bya'o// de nas tshe dang/ ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snya du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas kyang sangs
24b6(brgyad stong): rgyas kyis mo bzhugs shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ grangs mod dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad nas grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzlas te/ sangs rgyas kyi'o// 
24b7(brgyad stong): su mya ngan mas 'das pas yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro nas de ltar yang gnas par mi bya na/ des ji ltar gnas par bya tsA ba dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i
24b8(brgyad stong): seMs kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas
25a1(brgyad stong): ga re'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
25a2(brgyad stong): ba de sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni mi gnas pa ste/ den 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas pa/ 'dus ma rgyas kyi khams pa yang mi gnas te/ de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no nga// de nas rje dang ldan par
25a3(brgyad stong): 'byor kyis kau tshe dang ldan pa sha ri bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skar srab par byar// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoM zum pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa le'u yang mi gas
25a4(brgyad stong): dashing / me gnas pa yang ma yin la/ rnam par mi gnas pa de bzhin du des de ltar srab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ji lta ba de bzhin du gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du bslab dar bya'o zhes bya ba dang
25a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnas par bya'o// snyam pa ni/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par gnas pa yin te/ de ltar 'di lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos slab
25a6(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bul cig 'di sa du sems par 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gang gnod sbyin gis pa shad pa'i gnod sbyin gi tshig de dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu ma
25a7(brgyad stong): gnod sbyin gyi brjod pa de dag sman shes par rung gi gnas gtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang ci sgra zhing brjod pa dang / ston cing 'chang ba de ni shes par mi rung ngo snyam mo/ de nas rab 'byor gyis/ sangs rgyas
25a8(brgyad stong): kyi mthus lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i bu dag shes par mi rung shes par mi rung zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'di la cung zad kyang spos
25b1(brgyad stong): pa med de/ byang cung zad kyang thos par mi rung ngo // de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni gsal bar byed pa'o// e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni gsalo bar
25b2(brgyad stong): khyed bya s+ho ni dang ldan parab 'byor 'don rang ba bas kyang ces rang ba 'ang+gAg/ thabapas kyang ces phra bar 'jug/ zab pa pas kyang che bar ldardzun te/ so cing 'chang ngosnyam pa'o// de nas 'das ngas
25b3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag de lta bas na/ gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
25b4(brgyad stong): tho bu par 'dod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la granarnas par 'dod pa dang / gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / gang lan cig phyir 'ang ba'i nya bras bu la ste
25b5(brgyad stong): lngar 'dod pa dang / gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'an da pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang de gra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
25b6(brgyad stong): gnas po 'dod pa dang gang rang byang chu theb par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub po gnas par 'dod na yang bzod pa 'di la mnyen par mi 'grub bo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cem
25b7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod na/ yang bzod pa 'di la ma rten par mi 'grub bo// de nas yang lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gnas brtan rab tukyor 'di la chos
25b8(brgyad stong): nyin po ji lta bu dag btsal bar bya snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ lha'i bu de dag la smras za'o/ lha'i bu kha thas
26a1(brgyad stong): s+yAn sgyu smra nas ngag ga nga gyu b+h+yangs sa das pa sa gyu
26a2(brgyad stong): 'di sa ces smras so// 'bags pa 'byor kyi sems cad de dag sgyums su yin nam/ ma khams du yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ 'i bu dag sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu/ sems ca de dag ni rmilam
26a3(brgyad stong): khya ba ste/ lta bu dag nas desar sgyum dang sems can dgan gnyis su med de gnyis su byed med do// de sang mes ma rang sems can dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// nga lta'i bu dag chas thams cad / 
26a4(brgyad stong): sprul nas ga gdus/ rlu smras pas sgyubs na thamams nus/ rgyu lda pa ma na smral pa / de ban chog byed 'a chag bya
26a5(brgyad stong): za rab smras ma mamasas sus rang sas rgyas kyang
26a6(brgyad stong): thil pa la zus dzenas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rang 'byor rang sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbrum pa bu rmis ma sa zur/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyum lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs
26a7(brgyad stong): kha'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// zhes zer ram/ de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang
26a8(brgyad stong): sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta drung// zhes zer ram/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma ste bu rmi lam la bu'o// zhes zer ram/ chan 'byod kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag myo ngarnams 'das pa ya
26b1(brgyad stong): da sgyul lta bu rmi lam ga bur sman chos gzhan la ci smos/ su'i bu dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu mas bu rmi lam la bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor smras pa/ lha'i bu kha
26b2(brgyad stong): rdzogs mya nganams 'dres pa las 'a bar du phags pa chom gzhan zhig song kyang rjes sgra ba lta byon pa las su zhes d+hAr/ ni 'di sar sgyums rung / thamam rgya bya ma gyi rnams 'das thaM na gcas
26b3(brgyad stong): su med de gnyis su byar med do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po bye mas ma'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa lto rings dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po rnams
26b4(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la su dag yang dge par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas
26b5(brgyad stong): gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa'i
26b6(brgyad stong): theg pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas gtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag
26b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su lung mi 'byung ngo // de tser phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de la chos gang ma smos/ chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang
26b8(brgyad stong): ma bcas te/ ze ji ltar 'di lta chos gang yang ma smos/ chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bcas pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byungango // 
27a1(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor kyis de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyan na/ bdag gis kyang 'di ltar me tog dag mngon par sprul te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par
27a2(brgyad stong): gtor ro snyam mo ka de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gas de'i tshe me tog dag mngon par sprul nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor to// de nas gnas gtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rjes su
27a3(brgyad stong): brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtong ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gi sngon chad sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprur/ 
27a4(brgyad stong): pa'o// 'di ltar lha'i dbang pos mngon par tor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni shing dang gel ba dang / khri shing las skyes pa ma yin gyi/ yid las skyes pa'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
27a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sas kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byo ro me tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las
27a6(brgyad stong): skyes pa'i me tog gang yang med de/ shing dang gel ba dang / khri shing las skyes pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po rgya byin la 'di skad ces smras/ ke'u shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ni
27a7(brgyad stong): ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes pa yang ma yin/ shing dang gel ba dang / khri shing las skyes pa ma yin no zhes zer na/ ke'u shi ka ma skyes pa ni me tog kyang ma yin/ de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin 'di snyam
27a8(brgyad stong): du sems te/ e ma'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab zab ste/ ming dang tshig tu btags pa yang ston la/ de dang yang 'gal bar mi byed/ de nyid gsal bar byed cing de nyid nye bar ston snyam pa dang / de nas
27b1(brgyad stong): rgan dbang po sa byin gyis me dang ldan pa ras rmongs 'di da ma smra sa/ gas pa byor de panan no// de de bzhin te/ bags pa rang 'byor gang du ston pa de ba'in du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
27b2(brgyad stong): rnams kyi A pa de nga nga sum slo sa pa dbang po rkyen pa sa snru ba/ na/ sa/ shA na rnams
27b3(brgyad stong): dzin po de la slab par bya'o// ke ru shi ka de yang byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen pa ltar slob ma/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bul po slong po// yan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / byeng mi 'ang sa'i 'bras bu da/ 
27b4(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob bo// rang sangs rgyas nyid la mi slob sangs rgyas nyid la ma slob ste/ gangs 'di dag sa mi slob pa de ni sad sa rgyas nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob zo/ gang sangs
27b5(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa doni/ mang po rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa chad med pa la slob bo// gang sangs rgyas kyi ches rabag tu med pa tshang med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar/ 
27b6(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi spong bo// de tshor bas tha med/ 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba 'i phyir mi slob bo// gang gzug sa
27b7(brgyad stong): 'bal pa bya ba dang / 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi sgrub pa dang gang tshang ba la ma yis 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'angadu byed rnams la ma yin rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya dang / 'gre' bar bya ba'i phyir gyi slob pa / 
27b8(brgyad stong): gzugs yongasu bzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba dang / dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slo ba bro// nas
28a1(brgyad stong): ga gagang yang yongs su 'azung ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ chos dang yang yongs su bzung ba dang / nub par bya ba phyir ma smod pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba dang / nub par
28a2(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir mi slob bo/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems se pa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'thung rngu rje nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'dre
28a3(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la yang yongs su b.ru ba dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung
