84b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems kyang gang yin/ 'di ltar sems gnyis kyang 'grogs pa med la sems kyi rang bzhin yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus na/ ji ltar sems kyis
84b2(brgyad stong): sems yongasu bsngo bar nus/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gnas rten tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub seMs dang
84b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po dag gis bstan pa 'di thos na skrag cing dngangs pa dang / shin tu dngangs par 'gyur na mi rung ngo // 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pos rjes su
84b4(brgyad stong): yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ ji ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i
84b5(brgyad stong): dngos po yongs su bzung na/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ de nas 'phags pa rab 'byor kyis byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po byas pa/ 
84b6(brgyad stong): la brtsams kyang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bzhi byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byims pa la smras pa/ byams pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' sems
84b7(brgyad stong): sna che byas pa byom pom ldan pas la pa/ 'gyu sa pa grang ba dzi nga rnamam ya pa rje
85a1(brgyad stong): dag na/ 'jig rten gi khes re re yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi sems dang po skyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa/ 
85a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur
85a3(brgyad stong): pa dang / de'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon
85a4(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba pha
85a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa ci yod pa dang / gang zag 'ang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa
85a6(brgyad stong): can dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba gang yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i dge' ba'i rtsa ba ci yong pa dang / slob pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bgyi
85a7(brgyad stong): yod pa dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rna bar
85a8(brgyad stong): grol ba'i phung po dang na par gro ba'i lde ges gzigs pa'i phung po dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po ga yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan na
85b1(brgyad stong): tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de la gang gis slabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / chos la
85b2(brgyad stong): so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
85b3(brgyad stong): gang dag gis chos de dag thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos la thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang / gang dag gis sa
85b4(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa de dag thas cad gcig tu smras te/ bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su ma
85b5(brgyad stong): rang bar bya'o// rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i byang chub sos dpa' sos dpa' chen
85b6(brgyad stong): po la ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ 
85b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis yong su bsngo ba'i sems de la semasu 'du shes par ma gyur na
85b8(brgyad stong): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos pa yin no// nas sems
86a1(brgyad stong): de yang mi shes sems de 'di'o zhes bya bar yang mi shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin
86a2(brgyad stong): ci log par mi 'gyur ro// de ste sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang 'di ltar shes 'di ltar sems te/ sems de 'di'o zhes sems su 'du shes par 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
86a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyuraro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i
86a4(brgyad stong): sos de yang 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar sems te/ sems bses pa de'ang 'di ltar zad pa'ang zad par shes la/ gang zad pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus/ seMs gang gis yongs
86a5(brgyad stong): bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang ngag la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no/ 
86a6(brgyad stong): zhes/ gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na yang dag par yongasu bsngo ste/ log par yongs su mi bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo bar bya'o // gzhan yang 'phags pa rab
86a7(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chang pa/ grangs med dpag tu med pa dag sems dang
86a8(brgyad stong): po skyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongs su mya ngan las
86b1(brgyad stong): ga gas bya chub da na med pa chu byung brgyan pa de sa sa nga ldan pa'i dge lakyi yod pa dang / 
86b2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi theg pa can dga'ang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung bston pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa baji snyeng yod pa dang / gang zag pan thos kyi theg pa ca rnas kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bso zhes bya ba'i ngos 'ongs
86b3(brgyad stong): tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod zhes bya ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang / slob pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji yod pa da
86b4(brgyad stong): mi slob pa'i zag pa meng pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rna bar grol
86b5(brgyad stong): ba'i phung po dang rno bar grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon
86b6(brgyad stong): tan dpag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de dag la gang gis skabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa bcu yong pa dang / 
86b7(brgyad stong): chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / rna mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis
87a1(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos la/ thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sbran pa dang / gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang
87a2(brgyad stong): de dag yongs mya ngan las 'das pas dge ba'i rtsa ba spyan par 'gyur ba de dgra thos cang bcig tu bsdus te/ bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus par byan te/ ma lus pa la rjes su mi rang bar bya'o// rjes su
87a3(brgyad stong): yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nas bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ji ltar 'du shes phyin
87a4(brgyad stong): ci log tu mi 'gyur/ ji ltar sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ ji ltar lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis yongasu bsngo/ 
87a5(brgyad stong): ba'i sems de la sems su 'du shes par mi 'gyur na/ de ltar/ na byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang
87a6(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// nam sems de yang mi shes/ sems de 'di'o snyam du bya bar yang mi shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du
87a7(brgyad stong): shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro/ de ste sems gang gis yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de yang shes shing sems 'di'o zhes sems su 'du/ 
87a8(brgyad stong): shes par 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa
87b1(brgyad stong): chen po sems gang gis yong su bsngo ba'i sems de yang 'di ltar shes shing / 'di ltar sems te sems bas pa de yang de ltar zad pa'i zad par shes la gang zad pa de yang yong su bsngo bar mi nus// ses gang
87b2(brgyad stong): gis yongs su bsngos pa'i sems de'i chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes ga
87b3(brgyad stong): de ltar yongasu bsngo na/ yang dag par yongs su bsdu ste/ lo gyi bar yongs su mi bsgo'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo bar bya'o// gzhan yang 'phags pa rab 'byor byas
87b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen pos da ltar gi sangs rgyas cwo/ ldan 'das lam chad pa 'jug pazad pa/ spros pa rang srid par dren pa dang drangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'ji zhen las
87b5(brgyad stong): dazugs te/ 'gro pashes pa'i rnams sems rab pa skyid nas/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub man par rdzogs pa sangs rgyam pa'i ba dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya na
88a1(brgyad stong): gcan rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / sgo ba las byung ba'i bsod nams bya/ 
88a2(brgyad stong): ba'i dngos po dang / slob pa'i theg pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / me slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge pa'i rdza ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
88a3(brgyad stong): de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rno bar grol ba'i phung po dang / rna bar grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dang / 
88a4(brgyad stong): phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi nas gi yon tan dpag tu med pa sa badzin pa dang / sangs rgyas
88a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de dag la gang gis spabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yod pa dang / 
88a6(brgyad stong): chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po/ 
88a7(brgyad stong): dang / mi dang mi mo yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos la thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos nas dge ba'i/ 
88a8(brgyad stong): rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdoms shing gzhal nas ma lus
88b1(brgyad stong): par byas te/ ma lus brjes su mi 'ang bar bya'o// rjes su yi 'ang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
88b2(brgyad stong): bsngos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ seMs phyin ci log tu 'gyur lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' skyes
88b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la semasu 'du shes par mi 'gyur na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nas bya ba'i dngos po bla ma/ 
88b4(brgyad stong): med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nga ba yin no// nam sems de yang mi shes sos de 'di'o snyam du mi shes na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po
88b5(brgyad stong): 'du shes phyin ci log pur mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyuraro// de ste sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang shes shing sems 'a/ 
88b6(brgyad stong): zhes sem su 'du shes par 'gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur ro// yang gal te/ 
88b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seMs gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang 'di ltar sems de sems bas pa de yang de ltar zad pa yang zad par shes la gang zad pa de yang yongs su bsgo/ 
88b8(brgyad stong): bar mi nus/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag la yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de dag
89a1(brgyad stong): ga chos nyid kyang de yin no// zhe slong ltar yongs su bsngo na/ yang dag par yongs su bsngo ste/ log par yongasu mi bsngo'o// de ltar byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsngo bar bya'o/ 
89a2(brgyad stong): gnan sapa bags pa rab 'byor byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / nga ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa 'jug pa chad pa/ thos pa dang srid par 'a
89a3(brgyad stong): pa chang pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis sems dang po skyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
89a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i bar dang / yongasu
89a5(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'dra ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / nub par ma gyur pa'i bar dang / de dag gi bar gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyi pha rol tu
89a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur// 
89a7(brgyad stong): ba dang / lung bston pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung bston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gi dge
89a8(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims dang bsgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji yod pa dang / slob pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa
89b1(brgyad stong): med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / mi slob pa'i zag par med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzi gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phur
89b2(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rna bar grol ba'i me shes gzigs pa'i phu po ga nga yin pa dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs kyi
89b3(brgyad stong): kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa ris rtsi dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chang pa dang chos de la chos gang gis srabs pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba dang / 
89b4(brgyad stong): slob pa dang mos pa dang / mos par 'gyur ba dang / mos par byed pa dang / gnas pa dang gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas par byed pa de dag dgi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji yod pa dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang dag
89b5(brgyad stong): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba srun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bsgru/ na pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
89b6(brgyad stong): po dang / me dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis chos de thos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / nyan par dang / thos nas dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / bskyed pa dang / byol song gyi skye gnas su
89b7(brgyad stong): skyes pa'i sems can gang dag gis dram pa'i chos rje thos pa dang / thos par 'gyur ba dang / nyan pa dang thos nas dge ba'i rtsa ba sbran pa dang / brdzun par 'gyur ba dang / brdzun pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a
89b8(brgyad stong): de dag yong su myang na las 'das pa la gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa la brdzun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / brdzun pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing sdoms te gnas nas la lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la su mang
90a1(brgyad stong): yod pas kyi mam no// thad med pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu 'ongs su 'tho'o// zhes ces 'dra gang du blan med pa yangangs par rdzogs pa'i bye chub tu yos su srung bar gyur ci rjem ze / 
90a2(brgyad stong): ji sar byang chub sems dpa' ses dpang chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma 'gyur/ sems/ phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyen ci log tu mi 'gyur zhe na/ gal te yongs su bsngo zhing 'di snyam du chos de dag ni bang
90a3(brgyad stong): cing 'gags te/ med par gyur pa rnam par gyur pa ste/ chos de ni mi zad pa'o snyam du sems shing / de la yongs su bsngo ma/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos pa yin no// yang / 
90a4(brgyad stong): gal te 'di ltar chos ni chos la yongs su mi bsngo'o// snyam du nye bar rtog na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar yongasasu bsngo ba'i byang/ 
90a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar yongasu bsngo ba de la'ang mngon par mi chagaso/ 
90a6(brgyad stong): gal te 'di ltar shes te/ sems kyang sems su mi shes chos kyang chos su mi shes na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa chen tha
90a7(brgyad stong): kha bla na med pa'o// gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de shes nA/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lha
90b1(brgyad stong): bsngo ba de la mngon par chags pa'i phyir ro// gal de yang 'di snyam du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o// rjesu yi 'ang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de yang dben pa zhi ba'o// 
90b2(brgyad stong): snyam du ses pa dang / gal te 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni dben pa'o zhi ba'o snyam du shes na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ yongs su
90b3(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bsngo ba ci 'dra ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang de 'dra ste/ gang gis yong su bsngo ba de yang de'i rigs can de'i mtshan nyid can de'i rigs su rtogs pa de'i rang bzhin can no// 
90b4(brgyad stong): gal te de ltar shes na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnas ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar gnang ba mi mdzad de/ 
90b5(brgyad stong): gang 'ongs pa de ni zad pa med par gyur pa/ 'gags pa de yang rno bar gyur pa'o// gang ma 'ongs pa de yang ma phyin pa'o// da ltar byung ba de yang gnas pa mi dmigs te/ chos gang mi dmigs pa des ni mtshan ma yang ma/ 
90b6(brgyad stong): yin yul yang ma yin no// gal te de ltar mtshan mar 'dzin cing sems na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa ma yin no// de ste dran pa dang bral bas mtshan mar mi 'dzin mi ses
90b7(brgyad stong): pa dang dran pa dang bral ba 'am/ khong du ma chud pas yid la mi byed na/ de ltar na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ste mtshan ma de la mi sems shing mtshan mar
90b8(brgyad stong): mi 'dzin nan de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngos pa yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar
91a1(brgyad stong): langs po gyur 'dod pa'i nu gyi sa dang sas dpa be pos ses rab kyi pa mi phyin pa 'di gang chu ma yang bar mtha par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar byu/ klab par bya rab tu 'dod pa
91a2(brgyad stong): zang / so su dribar bya'o// de cir phyir zhes/ shes rab kyi 'o tu phyin pa lam nyen par thos pa dang mo ldan pa/ sa rab kyi pha ro tu byi pa ma
91a3(brgyad stong): sngo bar bya ga la 'jug mi nus so/ de la 'di skad du shes rab kyaipha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha ma brten kyang bsod nas bya ba'i dngos po de tha na/ med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngor rung ngo zhes che
91a4(brgyad stong): na/ de skad ma zer cig ces bya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus de dag kyang 'gags 'du byed dag kyang 'gags shing zhi ba dben pa dmigs pa dang bral ba yin na// gang zag 'di ni mtshan mar
91a5(brgyad stong): bya ste/ yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pas yang dag pa ji lta bar rno bar brtags nas/ yang dag pa ji lta bar 'du shes pas dmigs pa dag mi dmigs pa la yong su bsngo bar 'dod pa/ sangs rgyas bco ldan
91a6(brgyad stong): 'das rnas ni de lta bur yongasu bsngos bu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngor gnang ba mi mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyi yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa gang / 
91a7(brgyad stong): yin pa de sa yang mtshan mar byed cing rnam par rtog pa dang / myangan las 'das pa yong rna ba de dag gis dmigs na de nyid de'i dmigs pa chen po yin te// de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra com pa yang dag par rdzogs
91b1(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas rnaMs ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gi yongasu sngo ba don chen po byed pa'o zhes mi gsung// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa/ zug rngu dang bcas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 
91b2(brgyad stong): dper na kha zas bzang po dug can zhig yod la kha dog dang ro dang / dri sred par 'gyur ba zhig yin na/ dug yod pa yin pas na mkhas pa rjes kyis yongs su spang bar bya ste ka zla yongasu longs spyad pa ma
91b3(brgyad stong): yin no// skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin ni/ de yong su longs spyad par sems te/ des zas de zos nas kha dog dang dri dang ro yang myangs na zhu ba'i tshwa/ de la sdug sbal ba smin par gyur/ 
91b4(brgyad stong): de de'i bzhi las shi ba 'am shi ba tsam gyi sdug bsngal du gyur pa de bzhin du 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la kha cig log par zin cing lo// ga par rig pa dang log par kha ton du byas pas legs pa
91b5(brgyad stong): smras pa'i don ma shis shing / 'arjo dron yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin/ du khong ma chud pa dag 'di ltar 'dems shing ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag / tshur sheg/ 'das pa dang / me byon pa dang / da ltar
91b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyi tshul khrims kyi phung rtse rang ting 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rna bar thob pa'i phung po dang / rnab grol ba'i yo shes gzigs pa'i/ 
91b7(brgyad stong): rtswa'i phung po dang / de dag gi nyan thos gang dag gis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dngang ltar gyi sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das rnaMs la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa rnams dang dam pa'i chos ma
91b8(brgyad stong): nub kyi bar du de dag gi sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das de dag sems dang po skyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan la
92a1(brgyad stong): pa/ 'das pa'i dbyi su yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rjes dang / sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
92a2(brgyad stong): tu lung bstan pa dang / lung brtson par 'gyur ba dang / phung ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas gang dag lung bstan pa dang / lung brtson par 'gyur ba dang / lung bston par 'gyur ba de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa po sgyu
92a3(brgyad stong): ba dang bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / bskrun pa rnams dang / 'jig rten gi khas grangs med dpag tu med pa na/ bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rjes 'dzin
92a4(brgyad stong): rten gi khams thas cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsathas cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsngos te bzhal nas rje su yi rang zhingabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos
92a5(brgyad stong): ni de ltar yong su bsngo ba yang / mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongasu bsngo bas yang bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ kha zas drug dang bcas pa de bzhin du dmigs pa'i du shes can la yongasu sngo
92a6(brgyad stong): ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa'o// de bas na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis de ltar mi bslab kyi nges 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / 
92a7(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyis ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu bzung bar bya ba dang / ji ltar yongs su bzung na legs par yongs su bzung bar 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar
92a8(brgyad stong): bya ba dang / ji ltar yongasu bsngo na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongasu bsngo bar 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
92b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa mi 'debs par 'dod pas 'di ltar yongasu bsngo bar bya ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / 
92b2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis ji ltar mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba de ji lta ba dang / rigs gang yin pa dang / rigs gang rtogs pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid ga ldan
92b3(brgyad stong): bdang chos nyid grang gis yong ba de bsnyen du rje su mi rang ste/ dge ba'in pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis ji sbyar gan pa de bzhin du 'dag zla
92b4(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsal de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chug/ yong su bsngo'o snyas na/ de sar byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen to dmongasu brtson/ nyes pa med cing yang dag pa yongasu bsngos pa
92b5(brgyad stong): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa das pa pa yang dkyi pa rdzupa'i sas rgyam de dag la sbyong ba mi 'dres so// de ltar de'i longasu zla ba'i dug mong pa'i yongs 'thon men no// ma su bcwo
92b6(brgyad stong): na na kyi sdom kyi yo su cwa pas rdzogs pazhin yo sa // yongasu de/ ga pa'i bas sums par byed pa'o// 'du pa kyi / 
92b7(brgyad stong): ga brtson pa lta 'ad pa 'i la su ma sogs/ gzugs kyi lam su masogs/ gzugs med pa'i la su ma rtogs/ 'das pa ma yinas mom pa ma yin dag chu ma yin pa sang so bu po
93a1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhes gsu du mi rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin du yong su bsngo ba yang mi rtogs pa'o// chos gang la yongasu bsngo ba'i chos de yang ma rtogs pa'o// gal te de ltar mos shing yongasu
93a2(brgyad stong): bsngon/ de ltar yongasu bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po de'i yongasu bsngo ba ni chung ma zos pa yin ma rtogs pa yongasu bsngo ba chen po yongasu bsngo ba dug med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yongasu so// 
93a3(brgyad stong): ba yong su rdzogs pa legs par yong su rdzogs pa yin no// de ltar yongasu bsngo ba de la mngon par chags shing mtshan mar 'dzin na/ log par yongasu bsngo ba yino// de la gang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa'
93a4(brgyad stong): chen po'i yongasasu bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni chos nyid kyi yong su bsngo ba 'dis/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs mkhyen pa de ltar yongasu bsngo na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
93a5(brgyad stong): legs par yongasu bsngos pa yin no// 'di ni yang dag par yongasu bsngo ba/ yin gyis/ de ltar bdag gis yongasu bsngo'o ste na/ bla na med pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa
93a6(brgyad stong): yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas rten tshe dang ldan pa rab 'a byor la pos de bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa rab 'byor legaso legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
93a7(brgyad stong): de ltar khyod byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po rjes la chos ston pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor yongasu bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyingasu bsngo ba ste
93a8(brgyad stong): chos nyid 'di la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes kyis ji ltar gzigs pa dang / mkhyen pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de rigs gang yin pa dang / ris gar gtogs pa dang ci 'dra ba dang / rang bzhin gang yin/ 
93b1(brgyad stong): pa dang / man mamed nyid srir pa dang / chos nying gang yin pame gis yod pa bzhin du bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo'o snyam pa'i bsod nas kyi phung po ni/ stong gsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi kham
93b2(brgyad stong): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji med yod pa de dag thos cad rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo la ma zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par 'dzud cing bkod pa'i 'asod nas
93b3(brgyad stong): kyi phung po ji snyed yod pa de bas byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog

93b7(brgyad stong): khyer sems can de dag la yong su bsdus pa dang ldan pa'i bya chub sems papa' sems da chen po'i bsod rnams mngon par du byed pa 'dzin ma na sa bya tu gos pa
93b8(brgyad stong): rab ces bya'o// mchog ba ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa'o// rab 'byor skyongs su kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas dang
94a1(brgyad stong): drus kyi byed pa ses ca ji byed yod da las kyang ba ga nang byung ba las byung ba yonganas bya mngam thaman mas kyis pa 'o/ ra kya yongs su bya ba zhin po / 
94a2(brgyad stong): rten gi khas gang 'bru'i grung bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag pas pad tshid med bya ba'i thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor slongs su kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas gang 'a ga'i klung gi

94a4(brgyad stong): can ji snyed yod pa de dag thas cad gzugs med pa'i ltos par 'ju dag pa bzhi thob par gyur kyang / rab 'byor stong gsuM gyi stong chen po'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems

94b8(brgyad stong): na ba'i bsod sman dang yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par spyod pa thas cad kyis bskal bu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas te/ de 'ang rgya migs pa'i 'du shes kyis byin la
95a1(brgyad stong): rje grangs de lta bur de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' re res bskal pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gro byed cing / gos dang bsod snyos dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i bsoso snyan dang
95a2(brgyad stong): yo byang dang / byed bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / byed pa ma chog par myong ba thos cad kyis bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed ri mong byed mchong par byed/ rjed par byed/ gsol bar byed do// de bzhin du res kyang byang chu
95a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' de dag byas cad la na grangs de la bur sbyin pa byin no/ rab 'byor de rje sa tu sems/ ni byang chub ses dpa' de dag gi de'i bzhi las bsod nas mang du skyed ngas/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa

95b1(brgyad stong): ba sA ma'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang brgya stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang bye ba brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi

95b3(brgyad stong): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu rnams thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la
95b4(brgyad stong): mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad mkhyen po nyid du yongs su bsngos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po yongasu bsngo ba chen po lags te/ de ni 'di ltar dmigs/ 
95b5(brgyad stong): pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nas mngon par 'du byed pa de snyed kyang zil gyis mnan pa lags so// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsu pa'i lha'i ris
95b6(brgyad stong): lha'i bu brgya stong gis lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / phye ma rjes kyi char dang lha'i rin po che'i char dang / lha'i na

101a1(brgyad stong): shes mthong ba'i phung po rnaMs dang / nyan thos de dag gi yang tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rna bar grol ba dang / rna bar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de dag thos cad gcig tu smras
101a2(brgyad stong): shing sdoms te gzhal nas ma lus par byas shing ma lus pa la rje su yi rang bar bya'o// rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog dam pa/ gtso bo \u0f7ftsharab mchog rab/ gya nom pa/ bla ma/ bla na med pa grong na med pa/ gong ma'i ya
101a3(brgyad stong): gong ma man ba med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang man pa'i mtshungs pa med pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nas bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag pa
101a4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu song su bsngo na/ rab 'byor rjes su mi rab bdang ldan pa'i bsod nas bya ba'i dngos po 'dis/ byang chub sos dpa' dmigs pa can snga ma de dag gis brtson 'grus las byung ba'i bsod na/ 
101a5(brgyad stong): na pa pa na rgya gro sgyu// zhen/ den byu sems pa rnams pa'i tshums cas nga
101a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par grangs ce gnas para'i phyir ro// rab 'byor stong gsu kyi mong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khas gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sos can thos cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med
101a7(brgyad stong): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dag yi mi bsod cing rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi zil gyis mnon par/ brtson 'grus yang das
101a8(brgyad stong): mang thas te gnas pa lta ga ga/ rab byong stong gsug slong chen po'i 'jig zhen gi khas gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi seMs can thos cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs rkye dru
101b1(brgyad stong): med pa yang ngas par dzugs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas bskal pa gang 'ba'i grung gi bye ma byed du mags pa'i zhushes so can de dag ga pas can panam can par banag la/ bya chu seMs snar se myam ma
101b2(brgyad stong): chen po pang shes pas kyi pa rtso phyin pa dang bas mkhas pas pang su 'dzin pas 'as pa dang sa dzes pa dang / rasang byung ba mas rgyas ldan ngas rnam cu tshul khris kyi phu ma / na gyi
101b3(brgyad stong): shA kyi phung po dang rna ma grol ba'i phung po dang / tsA bar grol ba'i mi sa mthong ba'i drung po ladang / rang sas rgyas de dag gi yang chu gzisas dang ban da/ shes sa dang / rjebar grol ba dang rna bar grol bar/ 
101b4(brgyad stong): legs mthong ba'i phung po dang / nyan thos de dag gi yang tshul khrims dang / t-i nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang / rna bar grol pa dang ni pa bral ba'i gre shes mthong ba'i phung po de dag ces cad gcig tu bsdus shi sdams te ba'alamra
101b5(brgyad stong): ma lus pa byas shid/ ma lus pa sa rjesu yi rang bar byed de/ te rjes su laM rang ba'i mtshas dam pa/ gtso so/ rag mtsho/ ga rgyanapa / tham za na med pa/ gadzin med pa gdon med pa/ 
101b6(brgyad stong): gong ma'i yang gongs/ mnyam pa med pa mi mnyas pa dang ma nyel mtshungs pa med pa'i rdus yaM rang bas rjesu yi rang ba la/ rjesu ya~M re nus/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bso nas bya bas ngos mo blan med
101b7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i bachug tu yongs su bsngon/ rab 'byo rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsad nas bya ba'i dngos po 'dil byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa kyims can las byung rtsi rdo bsod nams la 'o
101b8(brgyad stong): byed pa snga ma deni rgya bar yang ba mi 'gro// slong gi bar yang / brgya ga ga sa bye ba se la bye ba rjo ra yang bye ba thong gir yang/ bye ba gyi slong gi masasabye khras / 
102a1(brgyad stong): brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can dag pas
102a2(brgyad stong): can dag la mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyir ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad bstod pa las/ rjes su yi rang po dang / yongs su bsngo ba zhes bya ba'i
102a3(brgyad stong): le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bco ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ga yin po'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zas cang mkhyen pa'i ye shes
102a4(brgyad stong): yongasu rdzogs pa lagaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nithams cad mkhyen pa nyid lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bu ji skad zer ba de bzhin
102a5(brgyad stong): gA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gos ra pha rol tu phyin pa ni gsal bar bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal
102a6(brgyad stong): bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rakyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni snang bar bgyid pa lags so
102a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa ni rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa lags so// bam ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu bgyod pa lags so// ba
102a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bde bar bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mdangs po rnams snang bar bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
102b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig lags so// bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib rnams rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa lags so
102b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mchos thams cad mi bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lam log par mchis pa'i seMs can
102b3(brgyad stong): rnams lam du 'dzud pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
102b4(brgyad stong): chos thams cad mi skyed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mi 'gog pa lags so// bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
102b5(brgyad stong): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gon ma mchis pa rnas kyi 'gon lags so
102b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba yongs su rdzogs pa
102b7(brgyad stong): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bgyi/ de skad ces gsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
102b8(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// sha ri'i bu bston pa la ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'ang de bzhin du gnas par bya'o// shA ri'i bu ston pa
104a1(brgyad stong): la rje lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la bya'o// sha ri'i bu bskon pa la ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya rgya
104a2(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'phags pa sha ri'i bu/ ci'i phyir 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ kye ma 'phags pa sha ri'i bu/ ci'i bzhi las 'di 'bri bar 'gyur snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
104a3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu ci'i phyir 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'phags pa sha ri'i bu ci'i bzhi las 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 
104a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byi/ na la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su zin pa'i/ 
104a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dgathams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bsngos pas/ byang chub
104a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' dmigs pa can de dag thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba gang yin pa dang / bzod pa las byung ba gang yin
104a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / brtson 'grus las byung ba gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan las byung ba'i bsod nas mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to// ke'u
104a8(brgyad stong): shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ dmu long brgya stong ngam/ brgya stong yang yongs su mtshon pa med na/ lam du 'jug pa'i bskal pa med cing / grong ngam/ grong khyer du 'jug
104b1(brgyad stong): pa'i bskal pa med de/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying mi thob ste/ yongasu
104b2(brgyad stong): mtshon pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir dmus long lta bu yin te/ thas cad mkhyen pa'i lam du 'jug pa'i skal ba yang med na/ thams cad mkhyen pa lta thob par mi byed
104b3(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka nam sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba de'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma
104b4(brgyad stong): dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yang thob po/ de'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa balnga po 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du 'jug pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rjes su thob par bya ba'i mag
104b5(brgyad stong): rab tu thob pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar na
104b6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa she ri DI'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// shA ri'i bu gzugs la mngon
104b7(brgyad stong): par mi sgrub par lta ste/ sha ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par mi sgrub par blta'o// sha ri'i bu phung po lnga rnams mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa
104b8(brgyad stong): de ni/ sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de ltar mngon par sgrub pas phung po lnga rnaMs la mngon par sgrubs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub ste/ mngon pa
105a1(brgyad stong): sgrub pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das lha tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
105a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa de ltar mngon par bsgrubs nas/ chos gang thob par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar mngon par sgrubs
105a3(brgyad stong): na/ chos gang yang thob par mi byed do/ sha ri'i bu nam chos gang yang thob par mi byed pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de nas bcom ldan
105a4(brgyad stong): 'das la lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa 'di thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid dam/ bco
105a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka 'di skadadu ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par mi bgyid dam zhes zer ba ni/ ji ltar
105a6(brgyad stong): dmigs pa de lta bur thob par mi byed do/ ming ji lta ba de lta bur thob par mi byed do// mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta ba de lta bur thob par mi byed do// rgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
105a7(brgyad stong): 'das 'o na ji ltar thob par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka ji ltar thob par mi byed pa de ltar thob par byed do// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das
105a8(brgyad stong): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang thob par mi byed mi skyed/ chos gang yang mi 'gog cing chos thas cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gog pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar
105b1(brgyad stong): gnas la/ gnas pa yang ma lags pa ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po
105b2(brgyad stong): dri lta bu yang 'tshal bar bgyid na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bu 'di ring du bgyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyi du gsog tu bgyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri gsob tu / 
105b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi bgyid do// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan napa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ 
105b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ni grangs gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgyud ring du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsog tu byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu
105b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di gsog tu byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi byed par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs te yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
105b6(brgyad stong): rolang tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gsal bar byas nas/ gzu gso yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du gas la ma yin/ 'du byed rnaMs pa ma yin/ 
105b7(brgyad stong): rna bar shes pa yongasu gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongasu gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma yi/ 
105b8(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa nyid yongasu gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas nyid yongasu gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin no// gnas gtan rab 'byor
106a1(brgyad stong): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lagaso// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
106a2(brgyad stong): ji snyam du sems/ rnam grangs gang gis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs chen por mi
106a3(brgyad stong): bgyid/ chu ngur bgyid/ gzugs bsdud par mi bgyid/ yengs par mi bgyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams ma lags te/ bco ldan
106a4(brgyad stong): 'das rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid chung ngur mi bgyidarnam par shes pa sdud par mi bgyid yengs par mi bgyi dang ngo do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnaMs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
106a5(brgyad stong): gang lags pa de dag kyang stobs dang ldan par mi bgyidastobs ma mchis par mi bgyid do/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chen por mi bgying chung ngur mi bgyid/ sdud par mi
106a6(brgyad stong): bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco ldan 'das thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma bsdus ma g.yengs pa lags so// gal te de ltar yang 'tshal bar bgyid na/ shes
106a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o snyam pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ma lags / 
106a8(brgyad stong): 'di nyid de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sos can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bgyi ste/ sos can ngo bo nyid ma mchis
106b1(brgyad stong): bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can dben pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben par rig par bgyi'o// sos can pas gyis mi khyab pas na shes rab kyi pha rol
106b2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa bas gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// sos can mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid lags pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid du rig par bgyi'o// seMs can mngon par rdzog
106b3(brgyad stong): bar 'tshang mi rgyabs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can don ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya bas na shes rab
106b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang do ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzog das par 'tshang ba rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// seMs can stobs yang dgi dbang sgrubs pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yang dag par sgru
106b5(brgyad stong): btsus kyi ste/ ma mams rnams byin pa saden sa ldan das la me sa gso dzin
107a1(brgyad stong): nga khyod du gyu ses gso pa nga ldan sa kyi se du 'dus sa gang du du lem pa da sems
107a2(brgyad stong): chen po de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sten bkur byas shing yongasu dris na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
107a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma bsnyen bkur byas shis yongs su 'dris nas/ 'jig rten gi khams gzhan dag nas 'dir skyes pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
107a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na ba la ston par 'du shes skyed do// bdag gi ston pa mngon gsum du gyu ra to/ bdag gis ston pa mthong ngo snyam du sems skyong do// 
107a5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa 'di 'chang ba la grags ci gus paro nyan to// gtam gyi bo tshang mi byed de/ sha'i ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sun ring bor spyad pa de lta du nga
107a6(brgyad stong): rig par byar/ sha re'i dri byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas mang po la snyen bkur byas par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gos
107a7(brgyad stong): bcoM ldan sa 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa 'am/ rtogs pa'i/ bas ba 'am/ bskyed par nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de 'di'o zhesa'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de na'o zhe 'am
107a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa de gang na zhes rdzib dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma gang gis kyang bstan par nus so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin mtshang
107b1(brgyad stong): ni phung po'am/ khams sa/ skye mamed dus na cing sde bar bzung bar mi nus// de ci byor zhe na/ rab byor chos thos du na pa dang / chos thams cad shin du ben par phyi zhes rab kyi se rol tu phyi pa mangs
107b2(brgyad stong): thar snyan pa'o// nye bar bzung ba dang / rtogs par mi nus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phung ba dang / khams dang skye mched las gzhan yang med par reg par bya ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang
107b3(brgyad stong): khams dang / skye mched nyid stong ba dben pa ste pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sku khams dang / skye mched 'di ni gnyis gnyis su byar med do/ stong zhing dben pa dang / zhi ba'i phyir ngo migs
107b4(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyi mi rimigs pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi rlo la tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ni 'du shes dang / kun shes pa byung / btags ba dang / tha snyad mi 'byung ba de'i tshe shes rab kyi phar
107b5(brgyad stong): byin pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du 'gying ba ro yur rje seMd
107b6(brgyad stong): gcig nas spyong par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa sod pas gang 'drin nim byer phye ste bung sman thong
107b7(brgyad stong): yin te/ rab 'byor ni grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dag mthong nas/ de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod bu spyad kyang shes rab kyi ngo'o// 
107b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la mi dang ma mos par 'gyur ba'i rna grangs kyang yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mo dang mo mos par 'gyur ba'i rna
108a1(brgyad stong): grangs kyang yod do// de ci'i slad zhe na/ sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa dang / bshad pa la ma gus pas nyon mi 'dod do
108a2(brgyad stong): nyan mi 'dod pas bsnyen bkur ma byed do// bsnyen bkur mi byed pas yongs su 'dra'o// yongs su ma 'dris pas ma dad / ma dad pas 'khor de nas byol te/ de dag de'i phyir chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las
108a3(brgyad stong): bstsags shing kun nas stsags te nye bar bsdus pas da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad cing ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa las byol zhing ma gus pa dad pas mos par mi byed de/ lus dang seMs kyis
108a4(brgyad stong): kyang mthun par mi byed de/ mthun par mi byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes mi rig khong du mi chud de/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma dad par 'gyur ro// ma dad bas mi nyan to// mi nyan
108a5(brgyad stong): bas mi shes so// ma shes pas mi mthong ngo // ma mthong bas khong da mi chud khong du ma chud pas chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i las/ brtsags shing nye bar sdud de/ de dag gis chos kyis 'phongs par
108a6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba'i las de bsgrags shing nye bar sdus pas/ shes rab tu chal bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dag gis chos shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas shing bsakra
108a7(brgyad stong): ba dang / kun nas sngags pa dang / nye bar sdus pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa la spong zhing dbang zad par gyur te/ dbang bzas nas 'byol bar 'gyuraro// rab 'byor
108a8(brgyad stong): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spong zhing dbang bzas te/ mi snyan pas brjod pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das rnams kyi zas cad mkhyen po nyid spangs par 'gyur/ dbang
108b1(brgyad stong): bzas par gyur/ mi snyan par rjod pas 'gyur/ de dag bdag gis rgyud ma rung ba byas shing / bsregs nas/ gzhan po nung bshes rab chung ba/ bsod nas rlung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba/ dad pa nam dang ldan pa
108b2(brgyad stong): dga' ba tsam dang ldan pa/ mos pa tsam dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa tsam dang ldan pa/ las dang po pa skal ba med pa rnams kyi dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsa ma dang / mos pa tsam dang / 'dod pa tsam dang phyir zlog cing 'bral bar byed
108b3(brgyad stong): ldog par byed de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig ma yin gis srab par mi bya'o zhes zer na/ de dag rang gi rgyud kyang ma rung bar byas shing 'bral bar byas te/ pha rol tu phyin kyi rgyud kyang ma rung bar byas shing bral bar byas nas
108b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur ba 'debs par 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skur ba btab na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur ba btab par 'gyuraro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bskur ba btab na/ 'das
108b5(brgyad stong): ba dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das rjes la ba skur pa btab par 'gyur ro// de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan / 'das rjes las 'byol bar 'gyur/ chos las yongs 'phong bar 'gyur
108b6(brgyad stong): dge 'dun las yongasu phyi rol tu byung / de dag sems can rjes la phan ba dang / bde ba rgyun gcod par 'o klung byed pas/ sems can de mal ba chen po rnamasu rnam par smin par 'gyur ba'i las nye bar sgrogaso// 
108b7(brgyad stong): de dag de lta bu'i chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba/ shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed ba nye bar gnas pas/ lo rgya phrag ming po lo stong phrag mang po/ lo rgya stong rgya phrag mang po/ lo bye ba khrag khrim
108b8(brgyad stong): brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po ni su yob tse zhing de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po nasaro/ de dag de lta bus yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen por gang dag yod pa de dag tu dong de/ 
109a1(brgyad stong): klu 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de dag de ltar bur yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'phor na/ me'i srung pa'i mal pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ me srung ba'i snal 'a gyu
109a2(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'jig rten gi khas gzhan nas sems can dmyal ba chen por gang dag yod pa de dag du dor te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag du skye bar 'gyur/ de dag der bor te ses tsan dmyal ba chen po de dag tu
109a3(brgyad stong): skyes ma thag tu de ni yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sos can mamyal ba chen por 'gyuraro// de dag de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba nas yang / me ba sdud pa'i bskal pa pyong bar 'gyur te dengadagi dzi
109a4(brgyad stong): 'phos ma thag tu 'jig rten gi khes gzhan dag na/ sos can dmyal ba chen po yod par der 'dor te/ seMs can dmyal ba chen po nas de dag du skye b.ra'agyu ro// de dag der yang de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho bar
109a5(brgyad stong): 'gyuraro// de dag der yang yun ring por seMs can dmyal ba chen po nas/ spos can dmyal ba chen por 'phon na/ der yang de bzhin du me'i sdud pa'i skal ba 'byung ba 'gyuraro// de dag me'i sdud pa'i skal khri byung ba dang / yang do nas shi 'phos
109a6(brgyad stong): mas ma thang ci lhag sa khrus pas 'jig rten go khas 'dir ba khor nas kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po nisu skye bar 'gyur/ yang dag sems can dmyal bachen po rnam su sos can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chen po khyod
109a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur// na mo'i snang ba'i skal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar du de dag de lta bu'i sdug sngal mang po tshor bar 'gyur ba'i las myong bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar tshig gis nyes pa spras pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcoM ldan 'a
109a8(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa nA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das mtshams ma mchis pa lnga'i las bgyis yang yid kyis nongs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nongs par spyad pa'i 'di'i gzugs nan du yang 'drabs lag so// bcoM ldan 'das
109b1(brgyad stong): myos sum garnye ba ni ni/ sha'i bu de bzhin/ gari'i bu mams med pa lngabyas pa ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa 'di'i gzugs nan du yang 'dra ba ma yin no// mas de sngags shing kun nas phy-i
109b2(brgyad stong): nye bar bsdus pa'i tshul 'dra ba tsam yang ma yin// gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang nye bar snyan pa na phyir gzhil bar sos shing spong bar 'gyur/ mi snyan par zer bar 'gyur te/ 'angs
109b3(brgyad stong): zasrab bar mi bya'o zhes tshig du smra bar 'gyur/ de ni de bzhin gshegs byas bshad pa ma yin/ zhes tshig smra'o// smra bar 'gyuraro// de dang sems can gzhan dag kyang 'bral bar byed de/ de dag gyi rgyud ma rung bar byas nas gzhan
109b4(brgyad stong): gi rgyud kyang mi rung bar byed/ bdag nyid dug can du byas nas/ gzhan gi rgyud kyang dug can du byed par 'gyu ro/ bdag nyid kyang phung nas/ gzhan yang phung bar byed par 'gyuraro// bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha
109b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi shes ma rtogs la/ gzhan dag kyi nga 'di la slab par mi bya bar 'dzin du 'jug pa'i gang zag de lta bu ni na ri'i bu ltar yang ngas mi gnang na/ de dag dang 'grogs lta ci smos/ snyen pa dang
109b6(brgyad stong): skur sti'i bya ba lta ci smos/ gnas bra m+b+ha ci spos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri buM de lta bu'i gang zag de dgi ni chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gang zag 'di lta bu dag ni shing rul ba wa~M bur gyur pa yin no// sha ri'i bu gang na
109b7(brgyad stong): de lta bu de dag ni nag pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bri gang zag de lta bu de dag las gang dag nyan pa dang / dad bar bya bar sems pa de dag zas cang tshul ma yin pas rlag par 'gyu ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pa'o// 
109b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa las sun 'byin pa de dag ni/ shari'i bu chos la sun 'byin pa'i gang zag du rig par bya'o// sha ri dus gso ba bcoM ldan las kyis gang zag der skyes shing / mis can dmyam can mchis pa'i yus de'i tshang ma stan to/ mi ldan
110a1(brgyad stong): 6/ gyis bka' stsal pa/ na ri'i bu gang zag der skyes pa'i lus de'i tshad lta zhog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu'i lus kyi chang thos nas/ kha nas khrag dron po skyug cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang / 'chib cus kyi sdug snga la mi zed
110a2(brgyad stong): ba dang / nad kyis reg cing tshig pa'i/ mya ngan gi zug rngur zhugs so// g.yangs chen por ltung nge/ skam pas stong bar gyur na mi ru nga / gang la nyes pa de dag yod pa'i lus de'i tshing 'jigs pa chen po'i be rud ni thos na/ bcoM ldan 'das
110a3(brgyad stong): kyi lus de'i tshad 'di tsam du 'gyur zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la go skabs ma phe'o/ lan gnyis lan gsuM du bco ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'il bus 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag de'i lus kyi tshad kyis
110a4(brgyad stong): phyi ma'i skye bo mang po la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur gis ngagahaM dang yid kyi las stsagasau shing kan nas stsags pa dang / nye bar brtsegs pa 'dis seMs can dmyal ba'i lus 'di lta bu chen po yongs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zhes bcoM ldan 'ad
110a5(brgyad stong): kyis bshad du gsol// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngag dang // yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed/ 'di bstsags pa dang / kun nas stsags pas yun ring po 'di tsam du sdug
110a6(brgyad stong): sngal myong bar 'gyur ro// zhes byas pa 'di nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po la snang bar byas par 'gyuraro// sha ri'i bu sdug sngal de nyid dpag de mod pa dang / sdug bsngal mang po gang yin pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu'i rigs
110a7(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo dag dkar po'i skal ba can rnaMs skyo bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mos lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yin
110a8(brgyad stong): las/ shin tu bsdam pa bgyi ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcoM ldan 'das de ltar dag gis nongs par smras pa de lta bus bsod nams ma lugs pa'i phung po chen po skyes so// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po 'di skye bar 'gyur/ 
110b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ngag gis nyes par smras pas/ bsod nams mngon par yin pa'i phung po de skyed skyeso// rab 'byor skyes bu'i rtswa mug de legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba
110b2(brgyad stong): de nyid la rab du byung la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di sun byung bar seMs/ spong bar sems/ phyir gzhil bar sems par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phyir gzhil na/ sangs
110b3(brgyad stong): rgyas bco ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang phyir gcil bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das kyi byang chub phyir gcil na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
110b4(brgyad stong): 'das rjes kyi thas cad mkhyen po nyid phyi r-i gtsal bar 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir bcil na/ dam pa'i chos kyi ru bcil bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos phyir cil na de bzhin gshegs
110b5(brgyad stong): ba'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil bar 'gyuraro// de bzhi na gshegs pa nyin thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil na 'o na na/ dkon mchog gsum las yong ye phyi rol du gyur pa yin te/ 
110b6(brgyad stong): dpag du med pa'i yang ches dpag du med pa'i mi dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'du byed pa yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcoM ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
110b7(brgyad stong): bu'i rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phyir gzhil bar ses bde ni rmyi gang lags/ rkyen gang lags bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo dbadud kyi byin gis rlangs pa'i shes
110b8(brgyad stong): Shachal bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi chos ca mo dag la ma dang bam mos par 'gyur ba'i/ rab 'don sdig pa'i grogs po'i mig du song sa yin na/ chos 'di ni dang ldan pas rigs kyi nur rigs kyi bu mang shes rab tu pha rob tu phyin pa la phyir nim
111a1(brgyad stong): ngakra/ 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rab 'bar rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag du song ba yin ne/ mi rtson pa yin ni/ mngon par zhen pa yin no/ bdag stod cing gzhan smod pa dang nyes pa'i klan ka tshol ba yin te/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'i rigs/ 
111a2(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di snyan pa dang / nye bar snyan pa la phyir gzhal bar ses pa de ni rno ba de dag dang ldan pa yin// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin brgyad stong pa las/ seMs can dmyal ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bdun pa'o// 
111a3(brgyad stong): bam po// / de nas bco ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi rtson pas mos par dka'o// bcoM ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin
111a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi rtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlung bdang / dgronan pa dang mi 'dod pa dang / thos babyung ba dang shes ma nan pa dang sdig pa'i dgrogs bos nye bar rten pa dang sri zhu chung ba dang / mi 'dri ba'i ring bzhin can dang dge
111a5(brgyad stong): chos la mi rtson pas morA dka'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol ba bco ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mos par dka' ba'i slad du ci tsa ma/ zab ba lags// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs ni macings
111a6(brgyad stong): ma grol ba'o// de ci'i sgra phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnaMs dang / rna bar shes pa ni macings ma gol ba'o/ de/ ci'i phyi re zhe na/ rab 'byor rno bar shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ 
111a7(brgyad stong): rna bar shes pa ma cings ma gol ba'o// rab 'byor gzugs sngon gi mtha' ma cings ma grol ba'o/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs sngon gi mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtha' ma cings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni phyi ma ni

111b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyirare zhe na/ rab 'byor rna bar shes pa ni sngon gi mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ rab 'byor ne bar shes pa ni sngon gi mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rno bar shes pa phyi ma'i mthara' macings ma grol ba'i de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rno bar shes pa phyi ma'i mtha' nga bo nyid med
