112a6(brgyad stong): gzugs med pa'i kham su shin du skye ba ma mchis pa'o bka bstsal pa'o sha ri'i shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro gsol ban ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma mtshal yang dag par 'tshal ba'o// bka bstsal pa sha ri'i bu shin du rje par dag pa'i phyiraro/ gsol
112a7(brgyad stong): bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ci zhig tshal cing yang dag par 'chal bka bstsal pa shi Ti shin tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi shes so// yang dag par mi shes// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu shin du rje bar dag pa'i phyir/ de bzhin du sha ri'iH
112b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nas dang / rnam par shes pa shes yang dag par mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'i shin tu rje par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thos cad
112b2(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid la phan par yang ma bgyid gnang par yang mi bgyid do// bka' stsal sha ri'i bu shin tu rna par dag pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa/ bcoM ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang yongasu mi 'dzin chos gang yang yongasu mi rnying ngo // bka' stsa
112b3(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcoM ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'das bdag rje par dag pas gzugs rje bar dag pa'o// bka stsal pa rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gsol pa bcoM ldan
112b4(brgyad stong): bdag rje par dag pas tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rjes dang bdag rje bar dag pas rdzi par shes pa rno bar dag pa'o// bka bstsal pa rab 'byor shin tu rno par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcoM ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pas/ 'bras bu rno par dag pa'o// bka bstsalapa
112b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shin tu rno bar dag pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag na/ par dag pas rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid rje par dag pa'o// bka' stsal pa rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcoM ldan 'das bdag rje par dag
112b6(brgyad stong): ma pa yang ma mchis mdzad par rtogs pa yang ma mchis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor tsha shin du rna par dag pa'i phyir gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bdag su ma mchis pas nabacom ldan 'das gzugs su mchis bkar stsal pa rang phyir shin du rnga par dag pa'i phyir ro 'gas pa
112b7(brgyad stong): bcoM ldan 'das bdag su mchis pas na tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rjes dang rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa'o// bka' stsal pa rab 'byor shin du rnaM par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcoM ldan 'das gang de ltar rtogs pa de ni/ byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po 'a shes
112b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bka bstsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pas phyir ro// gsol pa bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshu rol kyi 'gram na yang mi gnas pha rol tu phyin pa kyi 'gram na yang mi gnas gnyis ka 'i bar rgyang ring po 'bar du yang ginas
113a1(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pas 'iphyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems wasos rje chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dor bar 'gyur/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di myong ring por 'gyid par 'gyur
113a2(brgyad stong): bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa pa/ de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ming las kyang tshogs par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma las kyang chags par 'gyur ro// de bskad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcoM ldan 'das pa tshe dang lda parducu byor gyis 'di ses
113a3(brgyad stong): gagasol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di ltar chags pa 'di dag ba shad pa ni bco ldan 'das 'di tsam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di legs par shad cing legs par bstan te/ shin tu mthar thug pa ngo mtshar te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab
113a4(brgyad stong): pa'adi skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chags pa gang yin rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shi ra'i bu gzugs stong pa'o snyam pa ni chags pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / gar 'du shes dang 'du byed rjes dang tshe dang ldan pa shi ra 'i brdza par dag pa stong pa lo sta~M pa no
113a5(brgyad stong): chags pa'o// 'das pa'i chos rnaMs la 'das pa'i rnaMsu shes pa ni tshigs pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnaMs lam 'ongs pa'i chos su shes pa'o// nga ltar byung ba'i chos rnaMs la ltar byung ba'i chos rnaMs su shes pa ni chags pa'o// gang zag byang chub seMs dpa'i thig pas
113a6(brgyad stong): seMs dang po bskyed pas bsod nas 'di ci bskyed do// zhes bya ba ni tshigs pa 'odi nas lce'i dbang brgya bani gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di cis smras 'phags pa rab 'byor rje grangs gang gis chags par 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa ke'u sho ka gal te 'ad ri phyi chug sos rmi zhes
113a7(brgyad stong): chub kyi sem su yang dag par shes shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo 'o/ zhes yongasu bsngo na/ rigs kyi bu 'i rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs pa des sos kyis rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// de bas ma/ ke'u shi ka gan
113a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par bston pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang rab tu dag par byed pa dang / yang dag par btsud pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yang dag par rtogs pas/ yang dag par bstan par bya/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya/ rab tu dag pa
113b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par gzud par bya'o// de ltar na bdag nyid la yang gnod par mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyis gnang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'i rigs bu mo de 'tshigs pa'i/ mtha' 'di dag rje par spangs par 'gyur de nas/ 
113b2(brgyad stong): bco ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la dge'o zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyed de ltar byang chub sese rba sos dpa' chen po dag la chags pa'i mtha' khong du nas legs legaso rab 'byor de'i phyir chags pa rab tu gzhan dag kyang shin tu legs par nyon la yid la bzung
113b3(brgyad stong): mig dang ngas khyod la bshad/ bco ldan 'das legs so nas gsol nas ji dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis lhar nyan pa dang / ban ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'ang la rigs bu'i rigs kyi bu mo rang ba dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoM pa yang dag
113b4(brgyad stong): ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mang yid la byed na rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu de rigs kyi mtshan ji snying pa chags pa/ snying po nga snyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan mo las ni lags pa 'byung ste/ de 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang nga lngar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcoMs
113b5(brgyad stong): 'das rnams kyi zags pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag la rjes su yi rirang nas rje su yi ring ba keng ldan pa'i bdage ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byabyang chub tu yong su bsdu'o snyam na rab 'byor chos rjes kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dra ba
113b6(brgyad stong): ma 'ongs pa dang ngang ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ni dus gsuM las grol ba'i dus gsuM las rnaM par grol ba de ni yongasu bsngo bar mi nus so// mtshan mer byas mi rung dmigs par byed mi rung ste/ de ni mi thong ba dang / thos pa dang / rtogs pa dang / rje par rig pa ma yin no/ 
113b7(brgyad stong): kyis gsal pa bco ldan 'das rang bzhin ni bab po bka stsal pa rab 'byor bded pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha robal tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin zab bo// btsa ldan 'das kyis bka stsal pa rab 'byor rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir
113b8(brgyad stong): bzhin dben pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po// rab 'byor kyis gsol po bcoM ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rang bzhin dben pas ma/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tsha lo// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor
114a1(brgyad stong): cad ni rang bzhin dben pa ste/ rab 'byor chas thas cad kyi rang bzhin dben pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu rgya chu 'i/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rab 'byor chos kyis cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yaHsa
114a2(brgyad stong): par mngon par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcoM ldan 'das de lnga bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thos cad mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya so/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor
114a3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar chos gang giso chos de dag gang yang med do// rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa'o// rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa de ni ring bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med pas na chos bris cad kyi mtshad nyid gcig pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de bzhin gsheg
114a4(brgyad stong): pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bris cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med/ rab 'byor chos kyis cad kyi rang bzhin gcig tu bzod / rab 'byor rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa'o
114a5(brgyad stong): rangabazhin med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na chags pa'i mtha' de dag thas cad spangs pa yin no rab 'byod kyis gsol pa bcoM ldan 'das shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rjes su rig par dga'o/ bcoM ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor su yang dag pa
114a6(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba med do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcoM ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha relaphyin pa ni bas kau khyab pa 'o// bcoM ldan 'das kyis ka stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar seMs kyis rje bar rig par bya ba yin// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcoM ldan 'das shes rab kyi
114a7(brgyad stong): rab tu phyin pa nim 'gyis para'o/ tshe ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bye pa pa mi dmigs pa'o phyi shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa ma byas pa'o// rab 'bod kyis gsol pa/ lon byang chub sos thosos rba ched pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi pa ji ltar sbyang bar gyi
114a8(brgyad stong): batsha ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang khyod gal te gzugs la 'i spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshang ba la ma yin/ ma yin/ 'du byad rnaMs la ma yin/ ge le rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro
114b1(brgyad stong): spyod do// gang te gzugs stong pa'o zhes ma spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du gal te tshong ba la ma yin 'du shes la yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rje par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du spyod na shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin
114b2(brgyad stong): pa spyod do// gzugs gang ma yin no snyam du ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gzugs kyi gang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod da/ de bzhin du
114b3(brgyad stong): tshor ba ma yin// 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du 'ong rnams ma yin/ rje par shes pa gang ba ma yin no snyam du ma spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa gang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa shes pa ma yin no/ 
114b4(brgyad stong): zhes de ltar na mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de skad ces bka' stsal po dang / bco ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan parab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das de'i slad du de ltar chags
114b5(brgyad stong): pa nyid dang chags pa ma mchis pa nyid bshad pa mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkastsal pa dang / rab 'byor gzugs chags pa med pa'o/ snyam du
114b6(brgyad stong): mo spyod nashes rab kyi phyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyong / de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin no/ 'du shes
114b7(brgyad stong): kha mi yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin rngam parashes pa chags med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shas
114b8(brgyad stong): shes rab tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo rab 'byorade ltar byang chub sos
115a1(brgyad stong): dpa' ses dpa' chen po de ltar skyed na/ gzugs la chags pa mi skyed/ tshor ba la me smin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed nas la ma yin/ rnaM par shes pa mas chags pa mi skyed/ rgyun tu
115a2(brgyad stong): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi skyed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi bskyed/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la chags pa mi skyed/ dgra bcom pa nyid la chags bro mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas
115a3(brgyad stong): nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa mi skyed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma chags par me bcings pa ma grol ba
115a4(brgyad stong): yang dag par 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar chags pa tha thams cad las rab tu bzla ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyang bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis
115a5(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha kyi rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos 'di ni zang po/ de ni bsta/ rten kyang mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang mi 'grig bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstun
115a6(brgyad stong): kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad rje sa bka' stsal to// rab 'byor leg so li gso/ rab 'byor de de bzhino// 
115a7(brgyad stong): bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mtsho'i bar du bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i sngags pa ma brjod kyang / nam mkha' yongasu
115a8(brgyad stong): 'grib par mi 'gyur/ sngags brjod kyang na mkha' yongasu 'phel bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la sngags pa brjod kyang rjesu chags par yang mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs
115b1(brgyad stong): bar yang mi 'gyur/ sngags pa mu brjod kyang khong khro ba yang mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bstan kyang de snyed kyi
115b2(brgyad stong): zad do// ma bstan kyang dri skad du zad do// gnas rten rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rang
115b3(brgyad stong): kyi ba ral tu phyin pa sgom pa la zhum par mi bgyid/ ma su sor mi 'gyur/ 'dil rnal 'byor du med bgyid pa/ phyin mi rjo kun dka' ba bgyid ba lag so// 'di sa ste shes rab kyi ma rlom tu phyin pa rnaMl
115b4(brgyad stong): ni nam mkha' lnga sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis go ma bgos kyidri phyag bgyi ba lagaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang sems can rnaMs kyi slad du gron
115b5(brgyad stong): 'tshal ba de ni name mkha' la go ma 'tshal ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'u dang mtshungs pa'i seMs can chos kyai dbyings dang mtshungs pa rjes kyi slad du/ go ma bgo bar 'tshal lo// byang chub seMs
115b6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags te bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa chen po de pa'o logs/ 8/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'dzang
115b7(brgyad stong): rgya bar 'tshal ba 'di ni nam mkha' 'degs par 'tshal ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i chos rnaMs kyi slad du go ma 'tshal ba de ni brtson 'grus
115b8(brgyad stong): so kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa lagaso// de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis ponam ldan 'das ga ma kha de log su thal mo sbyar btung nas/ bco ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// drug bcom ldan 'as
116a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang yang mi bskyed/ chos gang yang 'gog par mi bgyid// de nas tsheng
116a2(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smraso// 'phags pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa ci la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa
116a3(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par sems pa de ni bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor
116a4(brgyad stong): du byed par 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin
116a5(brgyad stong): dpar 'gyur ba de la srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / swa ba ci zhi/ bgyi ba bka' stsal bar gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras/ ke'u
116a6(brgyad stong): shi ka ches gang la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de khyod kyis mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka
116a7(brgyad stong): gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bshad pa la gnas na/ de nyid de la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu
116a8(brgyad stong): phyin pa la spyod pa dang bral bar 'gyur na/ ma dang mi ma yin pa de glags lta ba dang / klags tshol ba de dag gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// ke'u shrI ka gang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
116b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spro bar bya bar sos pa de ni nam mkha' la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya bar sem so// ke'u shi ka 'di ska du sems/ ke'u shi ka khyod
116b2(brgyad stong): brag cha la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar sems par nus so/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de lta ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub seMs da / 
116b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa yang / chos rnaMs kyang brag cha lta bur yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes/ kun myi shes/ yang dag par mi shes/ mi snang
116b4(brgyad stong): med cing mi dmigs par gnas te/ gal te de ltar gnas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsu gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khas na/ rgyal po chen po
116b5(brgyad stong): bzhi ji snyed yod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thas cad dang mi 'jed kyi bdag po tshangs nye ba chen po yang bcoM ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ 
116b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / rgyal po chen po de dag dang
116b7(brgyad stong): lha'i dbang po brgya byin thas cad dang / tshangs pa chen po de dag thas cad dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis sangs rgyas stong yang dag par rje su dran te/ 
116b8(brgyad stong): de dag gis ming de dag nyid dang / yi ge de dag nyi dang / rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid zhu ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid lha'i dbang po brgya byin dag yon
117a1(brgyad stong): 'dri zhing kun 'dri ba byed pa dang / sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa dra no// byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po byams pa yang bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
117a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las// rna bar dag pa zhes bya ba'i khye'u ste brgyad pa'o// 
117a3(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsamo/ ming de yang mi dmigs te/ ngag gi dngos
117a4(brgyad stong): po de yang ming zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang ma mchis te/ ming ci lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du ming yang de bzhin te/ chos 'di gnyi
117a5(brgyad stong): ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ bcom ldan 'das ji'i slad du byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso nas/ ming 'di nyid/ 
117a6(brgyad stong): dang yi ge 'di dag gis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a di 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bco ldan 'das kyi sa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar
117a7(brgyad stong): byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po byas pa ni gzugs stong pa zhe'o/ gzugs bcings zhele/ gzugs grol ba zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshom pa pa ma yin 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rjes la ma yin
117a8(brgyad stong): rna bar shes pa stong pa dang rna bar shes pa bcings pa dang / rna bar shes pa grol ba'o zhes mngon par rdzogs pa 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor rna ba de lta bur byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po kyas la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chu/ 
117b1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bco ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di
117b2(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma'o shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yongasu dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs yongasu dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs dag pa'o// rab
117b3(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnaMs dang rnam par shes pa yongasu dag bsu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// rab 'byor na mkha' ma su dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// 
117b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs gos pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnaMs dang / rnam par shes pa gos pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
117b5(brgyad stong): pe yongasu dag pa'o// nam mkha' gos pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa yongasu dag pa'o// gos pa thas cad kyis gos par 'gyur ba'i/ chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs dag
117b6(brgyad stong): pa'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu la rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rnal du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la 'di nyid gras
117b7(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba 'di dag kyang rnyed par legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni nya
117b8(brgyad stong): nga ba mi spong bas 'chi ba'i dus mi bgyi // de dag la lha stong phrag mang po dag de'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de gang dang gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu
118a1(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang der bsod nas mang du skyed par 'gyuraro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcoM ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de de bzhin rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ rab
118a2(brgyad stong): 'byor rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad par lha stong phrag mang po dag 'ong bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rin
118a3(brgyad stong): bo che bla na med pa'o// yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nas mang du skyed par 'gyur mod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang ston pa la bar chad mang po byed par 'gyur
118a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rin po che ni dgra mang ste/ jitsa du dbyig tu gyur pa bzhin du dgra ches lci bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che chen po 'di ni bla na med pa'i rin po che
118a5(brgyad stong): chen po ste/ 'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa chos tha sa cang mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag par bya ba'i phyir mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu/ la gyis nye bar gnas pa yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
118a6(brgyad stong): chos gang la yang mi gnas chos gang la yang mi sbyor/ chos gang la yang mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thas cad ni ma cing mi dmig so// rab 'byor mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
118a7(brgyad stong): byin pa ni ma gos pa'o// rab 'byor ma gos pa zhes bya ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ma gos pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gos pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 
118a8(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang 'du byed nas dang / rna bar shes pa ma gos pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang ma gos pa'o// gal te de ltar yang dag par mi shes na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
118b1(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni chos gang la yang 'jug pa'i/ nges par 'jug pa'i/ yang dag par ston pa'i/ yong su thob par byed de/ nges par thod par byed pa med// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dgu bar snang la ca co dang ga gzhadag byed
118b2(brgyad stong): gos dag mthor zhing / e ma 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba lan gnyis 'byung bar snang // zhes 'dzer to// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ rang
118b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyisu bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang rab tu skor ba'i ldog pa medo/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin// 
118b4(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gang la yang chos thos cad la chags pa ma mchis pa
118b5(brgyad stong): dang / gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal la/ chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor yang
118b6(brgyad stong): chos gang yang mi ston pa'i byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po de'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// dri ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang smos par bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs te/ chos gang yang rab tu skor bar 'gyur ba ma mchis// de ci'i slad du zhe
118b7(brgyad stong): bco ldan 'das chos thas cad ni shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang yang mngon par sgrub par mi 'gyur/ rab tu skor bar mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco ldan 'das chos thas cad ni thog ma nas mngon par ma grub pa'o// 
118b8(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcoM ldan 'dra kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka stsal te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug pa'i ldog pa med// rab 'byor mtshan ma mang pa ni 'jug pa'i ldog pa med/ smon pa ni 'jug pa 'i ldog pa med/ 
118b9(brgyad stong): bang 'di ltar bstan pa ni chos thos cad bstan pa yin te/ sus kyang bstan pa med la sus kyang thos
119a1(brgyad stong): med/ sus kyang mnos pa med/ sus kyang mngon sum du ma byas/ sus kyang mngon du byed par mi 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
119a2(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
119a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das na mkha' mtha' yas pa'i slad du 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mnyam pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
119a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shin tu stong pa'i slad du 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// com ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni mi rdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong
119a5(brgyad stong): kha ma mchis shing lus ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i#pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
119a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i skad du 'di ni 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
119a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das mi khas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i slad du 'di ni mi bas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slad du 'di ni chos thams cad mi skye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
119a8(brgyad stong): 'das byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni shes pa po dang mthong ba po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
119b1(brgyad stong): pa'o// bco ldan 'das shi 'pho dang / skye ba dang mi skye ba'i slad du 'di ni mi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i
119b2(brgyad stong): slad du pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis shing rnam par grol bar mi bgyid pa'i slad du sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rno bar shes pa dang / mtshungs pa'i slad du 'di ni rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin
119b3(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di ni mi
119b4(brgyad stong): gos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlom sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad du 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcoM ldan 'das g.yo'i ba ma mchis pa'i skang du 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis
119b5(brgyad stong): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings gnas nyid kyi sku du 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan/ 'das chos thams cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du 'di ni 'dod chags
119b6(brgyad stong): dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcoM ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa'i slad du 'di ni sdang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du 'di no zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin
119b7(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du 'di ni skyon ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i don gyi slad du 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das chos
119b8(brgyad stong): thas cad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni yang dag pa ji lta ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma chags
120a1(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du 'di ni mtha ma rig pa'i phyi rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan das pa 'brel ba'i skad du ni pa'i bcos tu phyin par bcom ldan las chos thams cad can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyisa'i spang
120a2(brgyad stong): 'di ni mchog tu ma 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rtog pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du 'di ni mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos tshod ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni grangs ma mchis pa'i pha ra/ 
120a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du 'di ni rno bar mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
120a4(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rang bzhin gyi slad du 'di ni dmigasu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thas cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
120a5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gnas mi dmigs pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i srad du 'di na 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
120a6(brgyad stong): thams cad 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ne/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid mkha' dang 'dra ba'i slad du/ 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma
120a7(brgyad stong): tshigs pa'i slad du 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin par// bcom ldan 'das chos thos cad mi migs pa'i slad du 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma grub pa'i slang du 'di ni mtshan
120a8(brgyad stong): nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas mu me mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni dpag du med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bco ldan 'das mi rdzi ba'i slad du 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba
120b1(brgyad stong): tshul las shin tu 'das pa'i slad du 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu ma zhum pa'i slad du 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thos cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid
120b2(brgyad stong): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du 'di ni rang 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su 'tshal ba'i slad du
120b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi pha rob tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha ral tu phyin bu brgyad spong ba lam/ bstong pa'i laru ste dgu pa'o// 
120b4(brgyad stong): bam po// // de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin 'di snyam du sos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi rnal du grag bam 'gyur
120b5(brgyad stong): ba de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag pa'i bya ba byas pa yin na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rang/ tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / kha bzung zhing
120b6(brgyad stong): bcangs te klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / rab tu 'dan pa dang / sung ma nas shing kha ton byas nas/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa lta ci smos kyi
120b7(brgyad stong): de dag ni ngan ngon ma yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom
120b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa 'di bros shing / yongasu dri ba byas pa yin te/ gang bdag gis shes rgyas kyi pa rang tu phyin pa 'di nyid thos nas de lta na yang nyan te/ mnyan nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur
121a1(brgyad stong): 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ kha ton du byed par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du slob par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du
121a2(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur lce de dag ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid thos pa yin no// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab hU~M
121a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta bu bshad pa la/ zhum par mi 'gyur la/ kun tu zhu bar mi 'gyur/ yaM mi gsod/ yi gsod par mi 'gyur/ yid phyir 'phyogs par mi byed/ mi skrag/ mi dadang / shin tu dang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni
121a4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rje kha bskrun pa yin par rig par bya'o snyamo/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyi/ 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
121a5(brgyad stong): to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
121a6(brgyad stong): chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid na/ de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
121a7(brgyad stong): bo ji lta ba de bzhin du bzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / yongasu mi 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon/ 
121a8(brgyad stong): su du gyur par ma thos pa dang / sngon spyad pa dang / ma ldan pa rnaMs kyis shes rab kyi phra rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par mi nus so// bcoM ldan 'das gang dag ma rtogs pas spong bar sos pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni sngon
121b1(brgyad stong): gas me sa 'anamasus kya sas gyu gA/ na mas dus nga sa / na byung sa la du pa gas du pa dun
121b2(brgyad stong): kha de dag kyad/ de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ de dag gis sngon song shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa na/ spangs pas 'di ltar de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos pa ma mchis/ drang ba ma mchis na dga' ba sa
121b3(brgyad stong): mchis/ dang ba ma mchis/ bzod pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das rnaMs dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnaMs la yongasu ma dris te/ yongasu dri ba ma bgyis// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad
121b4(brgyad stong): ces smraso// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po ma spyad pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol dra tu phyin pa la spyod pa la mos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar ngo mtshar ci che/ de nas bcoM ldan
121b5(brgyad stong): 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoM ldan 'ang / sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa
121b6(brgyad stong): pa'i tshe shes la phyag 'tshal ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka bya sa kauT shi ka de de pon te/ de de bzhin no// kai ru shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha mong tu phyin pa 'i phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ chos sadum khyen parje zhes pa byeg 'a
121b7(brgyad stong): bzhin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zas cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'dims skyes te/ ke'u shi ka zas sang mkhyen pa'i ye shes las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyes par rab tu banago// de ltar shes
121b8(brgyad stong): rung kyi ba chub tu phyin pa 'das spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab gyi pa res tu phyin pa 'dis gnas par bye de ltar shes ra kyi ro tu phyin pa di na na 'byor debya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'din dkyis gam te/ 
122a1(brgyad stong): yom ldan sa byung chub mes pa'i sems dag chen po gas kyi 'o tu phyin pa la spyad du/ shes rgyun pa zhugs pa lags/ ji shes pakyi pa ra tsun pa nas 'byor byung byed/ den na
122a2(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang po brgyabyin pa 'di skad ces bka' gyul to// ke'u shi ka legs legs/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bci bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod kyi blams pa skyes// ke'u shig byang
122a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod na/ gzugs la mi gnas gzugs zhes mi gnas te/ keT shi ka 'di ltar byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po gzugs la mi gnas gzugs zhes mi gnas pas
122a4(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka de ltar na/ byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po gzugs lan ngal 'byor du byed// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed nas dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar
122a5(brgyad stong): bya chub sems dpa' sos dpa'i chen po rnam par shes pa la mi gnas rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas pas/ ke'u shi ka de lta na byang chub sems dpa seMs dpa' chen pos rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// ke'u shi ka
122a6(brgyad stong): gzugs zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na/ gzugaso zhes mi gnas/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rna bar shes pa'o zhes mi sbyor te/ ke'u shi kan rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na rna par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas
122a7(brgyad stong): de nas bcoM ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// bcoM ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzung
122a8(brgyad stong): re dag no/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis// bya bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ sha ri'i bu de de bzhin// de de bzhin te/ ngan ri'i bu gzugs zab bo snyam du mi gnas so// sha ri bu 'di ltar gzus
122b1(brgyad stong): zab po snyam du mi gnas pras/ de ltar na gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / shwa ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab bo ste du mi gnaso// sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rna bar shes pa zab bo ste du mi
122b2(brgyad stong): gnas pas/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed/ sha ri'i bu gzugs zab bo ste du rnal 'byor du mi byed/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugaso sA du rnal 'byor du mi byed pas/ de ltar na gzugs zabo snyed du mi gnaso de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du / 
122b3(brgyad stong): dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa zabo snye du rnal 'byor du mi byed/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes pa zab po b+ha du rnal 'byor du mi byed pas de ltar na rna bar shes pa zab po ste du mi gnaso/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
122b4(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes re ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pas/ byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnaMs kyi mdun du bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
122b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de ni nem nur mi ste bgyid/ the tsom 'tshal bar mi 'gyuraro// 9/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu gal te byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po
122b6(brgyad stong): sbyangs bstan pa'i 'du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dgad pa ni nye ba ci stong ngen ces smras pa nga tshung ldan 'anan num 'i nga ba 'u byin pa 'ad ces sgra'o// kenu shi ga gang sungam bstan pas/ shes bkyi pha rom tu
122b7(brgyad stong): byin pa 'di lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan par thob par 'gyur la/ zos nas kyang mi skrag mi dang shis tu dang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chul pos dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni yun ring ba nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ ris ring pos
122b8(brgyad stong): thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ des ni lung bstan pa la snyan pa yin/ byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rgya de bzhin gsheg pa dgra btso ba sA dag pa rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gnyis las mi 'dar ste/ de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
123a1(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par gyur te/ thugs dbyung bar byed par mi
123a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na yang lung snyan pas/ 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par
123a3(brgyad stong): thos par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan pa thos par 'gyur la/ thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun
123a4(brgyad stong): chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa yin te/ yun ring po nas theg pa
123a5(brgyad stong): la yang dag par bzhugs pa yin no// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la
123a6(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zaba' mo lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mnyan pa thob par 'gyur la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'ching
123a7(brgyad stong): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa// 'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rgyang ring po nas 'ongs pa yin te/ yun ring
123a8(brgyad stong): kho nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
123b1(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dpe' gsol bar bdag spobs so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rigs kyi bu 'am
123b2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i satheg pa gang de'i cha lim du yang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa min/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ mngon par rdzogs par
123b3(brgyad stong): byang chub par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rnam ma ya / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol
123b4(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa dang / bcu nga ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bgyi ba dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid
123b5(brgyad stong): par rnyed par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can zag de ni rgyang ring po nas/ mchis pa lags te/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can de ni lung snyan pa lagaso
123b6(brgyad stong): de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di chung ngu na mnyan par yang rnyed par
123b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o// / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das pal cher chos kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ba'i
123b8(brgyad stong): las brtsegs pa dang ma bral ba'i sems can de dag las phal cher ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sems mi mthun par 'gyur/ sems ldog par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa ni yang
124a1(brgyad stong): dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab tu mi 'jug ste/ gang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di la rab du gnon cing yang dag par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags// 
124a2(brgyad stong): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni dge ba'i brtsa ba shin tu bsags pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig 'brog dgon pa/ dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad
124a3(brgyad stong): zhes brgya ba 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya ba 'am/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya ba 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya ba 'am/ dpag tshad brgya phrag bcu pa'i 'brog dgon pa nas 'byung ba dang / des 'di ltar mtshan ma gang
124a4(brgyad stong): gas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal mchis par mngon pa'i ma tshan ma sngar gda' ba/ ba lang rtsi 'am/ phyugs rtsi 'am mtshams sam/ kun dga' ra ba phun sum tshogs pa 'am
124a5(brgyad stong): nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ de ma lags pa'i mtshan ma gzha na dag sngar mthong ba la/ des sems mtshan ma de dag mtsho nga ba dang / 'di snyam du 'di ltar mtshan ma 'di dag snang bas grong
124a6(brgyad stong): ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal du nye bar gyur to// snyam nas de ni dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lags te/ de la slan chad chom po yid la bgyid pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du
124a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la nye bar gnos na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
124a8(brgyad stong): tu bstan pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
124b1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi sa la sems par mi 'gyur/ 'jug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar snga ltas ganga' ba 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag 'gyi ba dang

124b3(brgyad stong): kyi mthus smra ba dang / smra bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yang gnas pa 'dri la/ khyod spos par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i dus 'di skad ces gsol to// 
124b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho chen por lta bar 'tshal bar gyur te/ skyes bu che na por mchis nas/ ji lta ji ltar mchis pa dang / gal te
124b5(brgyad stong): des ldum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtsha na ma mthong na/ de 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho'i la da du ring ngo snyam dam chal bar bgyi'o// gal te des ldum bu
124b6(brgyad stong): ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri'am/ ri'i mtshan ma ma mthong na/ des 'di sam du/ 'dri nas ni rgya mtsho chen po la nye'i snyim du mtshal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya che chen po ni dma' ba lags/ 
124b7(brgyad stong): sa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i ning na ldum bu 'am/ ldum bu'i mtshan ma 'am/ r-i 'am/ ri'i mi tshan ma 'am/ gang yang ma mchis te/ rgya mtsho chen po de mig gis ma mthong mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgya mtsho
124b8(brgyad stong): chen po ni bdag gis bsnyen te/ 'di phan chad brgya mtsho chen po mi ring ngo snyam du rtogs par rig go// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du rig par bgyi ste/ 
125a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mo 'di mnyan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag mngon gsum du lung stan kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med
125a2(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsnyen par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa thor ba'i slad du'o// bcom
125a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ dpyid ka'i dris nye bar gnas pa na/ shir sna tshogs kyi yal ka dang lo ma rnams lhag pa las/ lo ma byung ste/ lo ma byung ba dang / 'jam bu'i gling gi mi rnams nags tshal dag
125a4(brgyad stong): la mtshan ma sngar byung ba de dag mthong nas da ni me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams ring por mi thogs par 'byung ngo snyam nas yid dag la bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sdong
125a5(brgyad stong): po las mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag sngar gda' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang lte ba dang
125a6(brgyad stong): phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa'i slad du nye bar gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dge ba'i rtse ba yongs su sman par lags par rig par bgyi sde

125a8(brgyad stong): chen po de dag kyang bran mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bying nub tu rung bstan pa'i mtshan ma sngar byung ba yin gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni drin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu
125b1(brgyad stong): tu ring po ma thogs par lung bsten par thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rab tu dga' zhing rangs te ya mgu ba skyes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shud med sbrum ma lus rdzi bar gyu
125b2(brgyad stong): baji lnga ji ltar lus nam bskyod nas ner snyoms par 'gyur te/ 'chag pa las dang pa cher mi 'gyur/ kha zos chung ngu 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rmugs pa dang / gnyid nung bar 'gyur ro/ sgra ba nyung bar 'gyur
125b3(brgyad stong): stobs chung bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal mang bar 'gyur/ 'chag pa la ring du ma gnas par 'gyur/ 'grogs bai la dang cher mi 'gyur/ sngon gi nul lags pa yid la bgyi ba sten cing skams te mang du
125b4(brgyad stong): byas pas 'di lta bu'i tshur ba lus kyis myong ngo snyam na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mtshan ma 'di dag gda' ba'i srid du/ bud med la dede ni ring por mi thogs par nu 'byung bar 'chal bar 'gyi'o
125b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba 'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha ni pa 'di lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa'i slad
125b6(brgyad stong): 'dunye bar gnas la/ mnyan po ni de la dga' zhing shes rab kyi pha rog tu phyini pa la don du gnyer ba'i sems bskyed na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni blan med pa yang dag par
125b7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po ma thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'tshal baphyo'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu
125b8(brgyad stong): legs so legs so// shi'i bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ khyod spobs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
126a1(brgyad stong): de bzhi na gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i skye sangs rgyas kyis byang nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'di ltar legs par yongs su gtang ba 'dini ngom car tu
126a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying rtse ba dang / skye bo
126a3(brgyad stong): phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste/ lha dang mi rnams la bsnying brtsa ba can/ snying rtse ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod
126a4(brgyad stong): bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos ston par 'do dadapa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das

126a6(brgyad stong): stsal ba/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi 'phel ba dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
126a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tsher ba la ma yin/ 'du shes lam yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba ma nga dag par rjes mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // 
126a8(brgyad stong): bzhin du gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed nams la ma yin/ 
126b1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos ma yin/ 
126b2(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na bsam gis mi khyab par bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
126b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs bsam gis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gis ma khyab bo/ gzugs gsam gis mi khyab ces bya bar
126b4(brgyad stong): yang mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gis mi khyab ces bya bar mi shes na
126b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rma dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// brno ma ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la su zhig
126b6(brgyad stong): mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la spyad par gyur po gang 'byung bar 'gyur// shi ri
126b7(brgyad stong): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po spyad par gyur pa lags ji ltar na spyad par gyur pa zhes bgyi ba'i mang thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
126b8(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mi rtog/ mi 'jigs pa rnaMs la mi rtog/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi rtog/ thams cad mkhyen
127a1(brgyad stong): pa nyid la yang mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu stobs rnams bsam gis mi khyab/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis mi khyab/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyad
127a2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gas mi khyab / chos thams cad kyang bsam gas mi khyab pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
127a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ spyad par gyur pa zhes bya zhing / spyad par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
127a4(brgyad stong): 'das nam mkha' dag pa'i srad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ bco ma ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring po che'i phung 'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
127a5(brgyad stong): dag pa'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / rtse klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang
127a6(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi gir 'dri ba la bar chad bgyid pa mang po mi 'byung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan

127b1(brgyad stong): dang rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ge ra 'dri
127b2(brgyad stong): bal bdud sdig can dag par chang bya bar brtson par byed do// ci ste lo cig gis bris par gyur na yang myur du bris pa yini gos/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de dag
127b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rang 'byor 'di sa bu ni yod de/ gang rin po ni chen po sa ni par chad byed pa mang du 'byung ngo // de skad rjes bka' stsam po / bcom ldan 'das
127b4(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa la bdud sdig can bar chad bgyi bar spro ba chen po skyes nas brtson par

132a1(brgyad stong): kha cig gis ni ma rnyed par gyur da pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//

132a5(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di ma btsal yongs su brtul bar yang rnyed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de las gzhan pa'i mdo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa 'di nyid kyi don mngon par brjod pa de dag kyang bdag nyid 'di na

132a8(brgyad stong): dag kyang / bdag nyid de'i drung du 'ong zhing nye bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'i dul de dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan
132b1(brgyad stong): 'das pa rol tu phyin pa drug dang / ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ gzhan dag la ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
132b2(brgyad stong): sha ri'i mdo sde zab mo gzhan ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bdag nyid rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
132b3(brgyad stong): chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par gzeng sdong pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang // yang
132b4(brgyad stong): dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / rab tu 'byed par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de la slob par 'gyur na/ shA ri'i bu de dag skye ba 'phos nas kyang / stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / 
132b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di dag ga/ zhol zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las// 
132b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa'i phan yon gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ bcu pa'o// dam po// / de nas ban/ ma ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces
132b7(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi yon tan 'di dag/ ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su brjod na yang bcom ldan 'das de dag la bar du gcod pa lha la dag 'byung bar 'gyur
132b8(brgyad stong): ram/ de nas gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor bar chad byed pa'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
133a1(brgyad stong): gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das par du gcod par gyi ba'i nga du chud kyi las mang po ris dru ga 'acu ma ldan 'das kyis bklu gyugasbyong mas
133a2(brgyad stong): 'am rims kyi bu tsho gas ra kyi ro tu phyin pa 'chang pa de dag gi spongs pa ga na/ 'byung bar bya gyi/ bu 'byor 'di ni 'du kyis sa su rig byar bya/ ra 'byor somam
133a3(brgyad stong): nga yang g.yeng bar 'gyur te/ 'di mang bdud kyi las su rig por bya'o// rab 'byor klu len cing yi gar 'drin 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// tshe rab 'byor rnam par shes pa gzhan dang ldan pas yi gi
133a4(brgyad stong): 'dren pa 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par byar/ rab 'byor dran pa mi thob na 'od yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya/ rab 'byor bran tshun bzhar dgang zer zhing yi ger 'drin 'di yang nu
133a5(brgyad stong): kyi mas su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor phan tshun du co 'dri zhi yi ger 'drin 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor mig g.yeng zhing yi ger 'drin 'di yang bdud kyi las su rin
133a6(brgyad stong): za bar bya'o// rab 'byarang yi ger 'dri ba dag phan tshun mthun par gyur du na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gis 'di'i rting mi rnyed/ ro myong ngo zhes stan las langs te 'gro ba 'di
133a7(brgyad stong): yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang lung ma snyan to// zhes sems ma dad pas stan las langs te song na 'di yang bdud kyi lus su rig par
133a8(brgyad stong): bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal gi ming yang 'dir ma smos// 'dir bdag gi ming dang / rigs kyang ma smos/ bdag gi pha ma'i ming dang / rigs kyang
133b1(brgyad stong): 'dir ma smos/ bdag gang du skyes pa'i rigs kyang ma spros so snyam nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni mi nyan par sems shing / de de nas 'gro bar sems na de ji lta ji ltar bur sems bskyed bya
133b2(brgyad stong): go gis 'gro bar sems pade snyed du/ gang la rnal 'byor du bya bar 'gyur ba'i 'khor ba'i skal ba yong su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mo nyin pa'i
133b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges par mi 'byung ste/ rab 'byor 'dri yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor gang zag/ 
133b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen theg pa can dag shes da rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun sdud pa 'di spangs shing bor nas/ mdo sde gang dag thams cad mkhyen
133b5(brgyad stong): po'i ye shes sdud pa ma yin pa de dag btsal bar sems te/ rab 'byor de dag ji ltar 'jigs rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la slob par mi 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten
133b6(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges par 'byung bar mi 'dod pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mi slob po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma spangs pas/ 'jig
133b7(brgyad stong): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges par mi 'byung ste/ de ltar dro chung ba de dag 'jig rten mas 'das pa'i chos rnams pa dang / 'jig rten lus 'das pa'i chos rnams yang dag pa ji
133b8(brgyad stong): ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug par sems so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi ni byo bo las zan bslang ba btang ste/ les byed pa'i mi lus zan ba col
134a1(brgyad stong): mabar sems pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang zag byang chu sems dpa'i theg pa can ma yang ga shes rab kyi rob tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rna ba 'a bor te/ nyan thos
134a2(brgyad stong): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ma yal grwa dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu las snying po sangs rgyas nyid bsngal bar sems par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo nub pade dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams
134a3(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su sdud par mi shes te// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing bor nas de ma yin pa'i mdo sde gang nyan thos kyis mngon par snyan pa dag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa bstan pa de dag la lhag
134a4(brgyad stong): bar kun chub par bya bar sems te/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni yal ga dang / lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byorang byung
134a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa na dag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can slob pa de ltar mi slob bo// rab 'byor nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang
134a6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag ji ltar slob na/ rab 'byor de dag de ji snyam du sems te/ bdag cig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag cig pu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o// snyam ste bdag dul ba dang / 
134a7(brgyad stong): dngo/ yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i phyir/ dog pa'i rtsa ba mdzin par 'du byed pa'i sbyor thams cang bcom ste/ de ltar byang chu'i sems dado'i sems dpa' chen pos bsla par mi 'o// rang
134a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
134b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid la dgod par bya ste/ sems can gi khams dpag med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar brtsam ba
134b2(brgyad stong): sems su mi bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ glang po che ma mthong ba'i skyes bu lnga la zhig glang po che'i kha tog dbyibs tshol ste/ des mu khung nas glang po che zhig rnyed nas/ snang ba ga la ba der rtags te/ brtags
134b3(brgyad stong): nas glang po che'i rjes btsal bar sems shing / glang po che'i rjes las glang po che'i khe tog dang dbyibs rtog par byed na/ rab 'byorar de ji snyam du/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis
134b4(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag bya chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
134b5(brgyad stong): ba 'di mi shes mi 'dri zhing de spangs la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ mdo sde gang nyan thos kyi sa 'amangon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon
134b6(brgyad stong): par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems pa de dag de lta bur rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu rin po che tshol ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po mthong na/ der mi 'jug bcing rin po che de dag la mi sems
134b7(brgyad stong): mi dmigs te/ rin po che bkrang gi rmig brjes kyi ning du tshil bar sems/ bgrang gi rmig rjes kyi chu dang / rgya mtsho chen por mtshungs par bya bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems skyes bu de'i mkhas
134b8(brgyad stong): ba'i ring bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ldam lags so// banom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal la/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang thog byang chub sems dpa'i thig pa can gang shes
135a1(brgyad stong): sa karab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nas ma rtogs shing ni shes par 'dod par byed do// mdo sde gang dag nyan thos kyis mngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi mngon par ston pa de dag brtson po rlung ngus
135a2(brgyad stong): gnas par 'dod pas/ bcal bar sems pa de dag ni de lta bur rig par bya'o// gang las byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bsngags pa ma 'byung la/ bdag gcig pu dul ba dang / zhi ba dang po yongs su mya ngan mes 'ad
135a3(brgyad stong): ba'i tshe na nang du yang dag par bzhag la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o// lon cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob ba bar bya'o// rang byang
135a4(brgyad stong): chub thob par bya'o// tshe 'di nyid la zag pa las len pa med par se dmaso yongasu grol bar bya ste/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam pa ni nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa zhes
135a5(brgyad stong): bya ste/ rab 'byo/ rang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de ltar sems skyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa la yang dag
135a6(brgyad stong): par zhugs shing / go cha chen po 'gos pa yin te/ de dag gis nim du yang spro ba chung ngu la sems mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag 'jig rten yongs su 'dren pa'o// 'jig rten gi don
135a7(brgyad stong): byed pa yin te/ de bas rtag du rgyun ma 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slab par bya'o// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po theg pa can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu ma smin pa/ blo chung
135a8(brgyad stong): lhag pa'i bsam pa zhan pa/ de dag pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag ma shes shing khong du ma chud pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri bor te/ mdo sde gang dag nyan thos
135b1(brgyad stong): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems te/ rab 'byor da 'ang yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can 'di lta bu de dag gis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab
135b2(brgyad stong): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shing mkhan gi slob ma zhig rnam par rgyal du'i chung du khang pa byed par 'dod sgrub par 'dod nas de nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi ched dang / dkyil 'khor mingasu
135b3(brgyad stong): tshos te yongs su rtsol bas nyi ma dang / zla ba'i gzhas med khang mthong ba dang / de dag gi ched 'thung bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pabyed par 'dod pa dang / sgrub pa
135b4(brgyad stong): 'dod pas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi chang bzung bar bya ba ma yin nam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bco ma ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
135b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i des na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la la dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas
135b6(brgyad stong): nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di btang nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid yongs su tshol bar
135b7(brgyad stong): sems te/ mdo sde gang bdag cig pu dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes mngon par stong pa bdag 'ba' zhig dul ba dang / zhi ba dang
135b8(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa de lta bu'i mdo sde dag yongs su tshol zhing de lta bur slob par sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin du rig
136a1(brgyad stong): par bya ba 'am hA rab 'byor kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'ad san gas son/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di sang
136a2(brgyad stong): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta 'dod la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i kha tog dang / dbyings dang / gzi brjid dang
136a3(brgyad stong): rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra'o zhes mtshan mar bzung na/ mkhar gyi rgyal por mthong na/ des 'khar gyi rgyal po'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzi brjid dang / mtshan mar bzung ste/ bye brag shes par
136a4(brgyad stong): ma 'gyur la/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzi rdzid dang / mtshan ma la di 'dra'o zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang 'khor
136a5(brgyad stong): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / 'khar gyi rgyal po mtshungs par bya bar/ sems pa'o skyes bu de mkhyes pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lag
136a6(brgyad stong): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rob kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing shes rab kyi pha rlom
136a7(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i
136a8(brgyad stong): mdo sde dag las/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yongs su btsal bar sems padag 'byung ba 'di yang / rab 'byor 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byorarang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
136b1(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yong su btsal bar bya'o zhes nga mi smra ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' ses
136b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas gang bshad pa de la ma spangs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ 
136b3(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ma yin pa'i mdo sde gzhan dag las byang chub sgrub ba 'byung ba ni/ bul ba yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas ni de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phan yon de dag gzigs pas
136b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ci nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyurasnyam ste/ rnam grangs du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

136b6(brgyad stong): yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang phyir mi ldog pa'i theg pa'i thag pa chen po thob cing bsgrubs na// de bor te yang phyir mi ldog pa'i thag pa yongs su btsal bar sems na/ de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
136b7(brgyad stong): can yin namatorab 'byor kyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de lta ma la gso bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu klas pa zhig gis
136b8(brgyad stong): kha zas ro rgyab zhun pon bzhun 'de ba/ che'i mthar thug gi bar du bkres pa dang / skom pa bzlog pa zhig rnyed la des de bor te/ zhag drug bcu'i 'bras bu can byar sems shing / zhag drug bcu 'a
137a1(brgyad stong): 'bras can rnyed nas/ kha zas ro brgya ba bor te/ zhag drug bcu'i'i 'bras can btsal bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems / skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam// rab 'byor
137a2(brgyad stong): kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
137a3(brgyad stong): thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di btang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor nas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang

137a7(brgyad stong): zang med pa dang / mtshungs par bya bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du semasaskyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya ba 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
137a8(brgyad stong): de lta mu lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po// rab 'byor de de bzhin dum 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo rin
137b1(brgyad stong): che 'dri thos shing rnyed nas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang mtshungs par bya bar sems par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas/ thams cad mkhyen par
137b2(brgyad stong): nyid dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su btsal bar sems na// rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// de byang chub sems dpa' de dag mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan

137b4(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / chung ngu na yi ger 'dri ba la yang gang g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'i spobs pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor nga 'di
137b5(brgyad stong): yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
137b6(brgyad stong): yi gre ru drir rung lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gang su dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
137b7(brgyad stong): bri bar sems shing / yi ge dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags na/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
137b8(brgyad stong): yi ge ri 'dri ba la ljongs yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ yul gyi yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / 
138a1(brgyad stong): pho brang 'khor mi la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ skyed mos tshal yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ tha ma med la byed pa dge 'byung bar 'gyur/ kun bstan pa med la byed pa dag 'thung
138a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ chom rkun yid la byed pa dang / smad 'tshong yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ bde ba yid la byed pa dang / bsdug bsngal ba yid la byed pa dang / 'jigs pa yod la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
138a3(brgyad stong): dbud med yid la byed pa 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa yid la byed pa dang / mi nang yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur// mdza' ba dang / mi 'dza' ba dang snrel zhi yid la byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ pha ma dang

138a7(brgyad stong): sa bzang po yid la byed pa dang / dus ngan pa yid la byed pa dang / glu yid la byed pa dang / sil snyan yid la byed pa dang / gar yid la byed pa dang / snyan ngogs dang / glu tshag srung yid la byed pa dang / gtsug
138a8(brgyad stong): mag yid la byed pa dang / tha snyad yid la byed pa dang / gzhad dgang yid la byed pa dang / mya ngan yid la byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa yid la byed pa dang / rab 'byor nga yid la byed pa de dag dang / gzhan dag yang
