271b7(brgyad stong): gzhan dga'am khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal lam/ rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas dbang du gyur te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// yang byang chub sems
271b8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod cing / de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod
273a1(brgyad stong): pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas kyi khri gser gi rkang pa dang / dngul gyi rkang pa dang / bye dur+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa
273a2(brgyad stong): btsugs pa/ shing bal bting ba stan par tshangs rtse can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i gos bting ba/ 'phang du rgyang grags phyed yod pa bshams te/ steng du gos kyi bla re mu ti gI brgyan pa bres
273a3(brgyad stong): shing / de ltar chos la gus pa byed pas/ sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug kyang me tog kha dog sna lnga pa dag mngon par gtog cig/ sa phyogs de yang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdug par
273a4(brgyad stong): byed de/ ji ltar chos 'di gsal bar bya'o// zhes bsam pa rnam par dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos la gus pas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273a5(brgyad stong): bo chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston// te rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ni de lta bur chos la gusapar byed cing chos rnams la rten pa dang dad pa dang ldan pas dad pa dang dang
273a6(brgyad stong): bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag sa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to/ de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang mi'i srog chags mang po srog chags stong phrag stong phrag
273a7(brgyad stong): mang po srog chags rgya stong phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni/ lung nod pa la la ni kha don byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri// la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de tsa/ sems can de dag theg
273a8(brgyad stong): cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du song bzhin
273b1(brgyad stong): dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa yang dag
273b2(brgyad stong): par 'dzin tu 'jug paka yang dag par gzegs stong pa/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de bas kyang sngon da ltar khyod ji ltar tshol ba bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal
273b3(brgyad stong): gyis rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid la byed pa rgyun ma chad par gnas pas song shig dang ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin thos par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus thos nas
273b4(brgyad stong): dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu dga' zhing rga ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mdo'u dug can shig gis phrog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi gang bdag sdug bsngal 'di las tha/ 
273b5(brgyad stong): bar byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam rnyed semasapa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rta// ga tu ngu yang de'i tshe gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de thos par/ 
273b6(brgyad stong): byed cing chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid la byed pa spong bar 'gyur/ bdag gi zug rngu 'di nam 'byin par 'gyur ba gang bdag gi sdug sngal 'di las nam grol bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de bdag gis ni
273b7(brgyad stong): mthong snyam du sems pa ma rtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de nyi du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha chos 'pha
273b8(brgyad stong): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so// thos nas kyang chos thams cad la mo gnas pa'i 'du shes skyed nas/ ti nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta
274a1(brgyad stong): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid shes pa la nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thos
274a2(brgyad stong): tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mu med pa/ 
274a3(brgyad stong): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes/ 
274a4(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog kram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bdag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ra ti nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
274a5(brgyad stong): dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba/ 'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
274a6(brgyad stong): sems can mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i sarjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bru sna tshogs sgrub pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin dang
274a7(brgyad stong): ma khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gyis tha dad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i sgra dang / tshig
274a8(brgyad stong): dang 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i
274b1(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang 'tshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i tong nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes
274b2(brgyad stong): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i dmigs ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dngos su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dngongs
274b3(brgyad stong): su nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs sbyin pa 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngen 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil gyis/ 
274b4(brgyad stong): gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem
274b5(brgyad stong): nur rtsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams ca/ dad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos tha/ mas cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
274b6(brgyad stong): mngon par shes pa rang stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la nges paradamigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi
274b7(brgyad stong): 'byord pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po zhes pathams cad rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting
274b8(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin dang / mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa thams cad rnam par dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzi
275a1(brgyad stong): dang le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya
275a2(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la rnam par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i
275a3(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang mngon du gyur te/ de ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das drangs
275a4(brgyad stong): myed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis legs so zhes bya byin nas
275a5(brgyad stong): dbugs 'byung bar mdzad do// tshig 'di skad kyang gsung ngo // rigasakyi bu des kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na te/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa 'di bzhin du btsal te
275a6(brgyad stong): yongs su tshol ba na yang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par gyur/ 
275a7(brgyad stong): to// nged kyis kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin la ltas na gang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba 'am ldang bar bya ba 'am byang chub tu spyad par bya ba 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
275a8(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mi mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ rigs kyi bu chos gang gis
275b1(brgyad stong): kyang rlom sems sam rlom sems myi byed pa la gnas nas nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i lus gser gi kha tog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po rgya bcu dang / 'od la
275b2(brgyad stong): gang dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na myed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob ste/ 
275b3(brgyad stong): yonan tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad bzung ba 'am mtha' bstan par mi nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos la
275b4(brgyad stong): ngag nyid la rab tu gnyer ba dang 'dod pas gus pa mchog tu skyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don du gnyer ba dang / 'dod pa la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par rga ba ma yin no// 
275b5(brgyad stong): khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa skyed par bya/ phangs skye bar bya/ rab tu dang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
275b6(brgyad stong): po ni myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces
275b7(brgyad stong): gsol to// bdag gi dge ba'i yeshes gnyen gang lags de dag gis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na myed
275b8(brgyad stong): pa yang dge bur rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la skabs so// rigs kyi bu de ni/ 
276a1(brgyad stong): khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin te/ byas pa tshor ba des khyod la ji skad sgo ba bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phagras
276a2(brgyad stong): la skal ba 'am skal pa gnyis sam skal pa gsum/ skal pa brgya 'am skal pa stong ngam bskal brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang 'gro la thod bzhin du thogs shing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror
276a3(brgyad stong): byas te/ stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams na gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang reg pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de la lan ldon pa ma yin no// de ci phyir zhe na/ 
276a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams rnye da par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs ma khas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur to// 
276a5(brgyad stong): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' se/ nyams dpa' chen po rtag tu du dbugs phyung nas mi snang bar gyu/ rang to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de las langs te langs nas
276a6(brgyad stong): yang de 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ma mthong bar rab tu chung zhing mi rga bar gyur to// 
276a7(brgyad stong): yang 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gi rgyal ba rnams la bya bo byas pa ste/ bdag gis
276a8(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gang nas byon de dgazhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyamo// des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du byang chub sems
276b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen chos 'phags la rga ba dang dad pa dang ri mo dang gus par byed pa nye bar gzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag gis ji lta bur kur bstir bya ba byas pa byang chub sems
276b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag dbul te gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i gos rin po che'am gser ram/ 
276b3(brgyad stong): nor bu 'am mu tig gam/ bye dur+ya 'am/ dung ngam nam shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam spos sam/ phreng ba'am byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am gos sam rdugs sam rgyal mtshan nam/ ba dan de lta/ 
276b4(brgyad stong): bu yang bdag la myed la na bdag 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni bdag gis mi rigs pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag rga ba 'am rangs pa yangs mi skye'o snyam
276b5(brgyad stong): du sems so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang bla ma la gus pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pas song nas mthar kyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin/ 
276b6(brgyad stong): par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du grong bar ga la ba der song ngo // de grong bar gi dbus su phyin nas de 'odi snyam du ses te 'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la de'i rin gyis byang chub
276b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gis lus ston zhig zad de 'gags pa bcings so// 'khor dpag tu myed pa na 'dod pa'i phyir dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang
276b8(brgyad stong): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug sngal dpag tu myed pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir ma yin snyamo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu
277a1(brgyad stong): du grong bar du 'dug ste myi su 'dod mi su 'dod myi su nyo bar 'dod ces sgra sbags shing skad ces zos te/ de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di ni ches 'dod
277a2(brgyad stong): pa'i bladag nyid btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti byed cing ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na myur du tha na myed pa yang
277a3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang bdud kyi lce dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes
277a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su 'dri bar 'gyur te/ der sems can mang po dag gis don byed par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyas
277a5(brgyad stong): nas/ de dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' byed sems can gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur gyis bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyamo// de nas bdud sdig can ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdas
277a6(brgyad stong): ngag gis byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu du mi su 'dod mi su nye bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra ji ltar mi thos par gyur pa'i de lta bur yongasu sgrib so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen
277a7(brgyad stong): ba drug tu ngu'i gang gi tshe bdag zho ba rnyid pa de'i che/ phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma byung nas 'di ltar bdag gi pus btsongs nas byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po tshes 'phags la bkur stir bya snyam nas lus nyo ba yang
277a8(brgyad stong): bdag gis ma rnyed de kye ma bdag gis thob pa ngan pa cig thob bo snyam nas de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa lo phyir bdag gi
277b1(brgyad stong): lus yongs su btang ba lhag pa'i bsam pa phun su tshogs pa yin na ma yin snyam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam ste/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i cha byad du mngon
277b2(brgyad stong): bar sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyod yid mi rga shing yid rdung / 
277b3(brgyad stong): la mchi ma byung ba ci nyes de la rtag tu ngungs 'di skad ces smraso// bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus 'tshang bar 'dod na lus 'di nyo ba ma rnye do// brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs can gyis smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid
277b4(brgyad stong): 'tshong bar 'dod rtag tu dus smras pa bram ze'i khye'u nga ni chos 'dod pa'i phyirabadag nyid btsongs te chos la mchod pa bya bar 'dod cing 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
277b5(brgyad stong): la yang bkur stir bya bar 'dod na lus nyo ba de ngas ma rnyed nas de la nga 'di/ snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyina'i
277b6(brgyad stong): la mchod pa dang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bstir bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyom yang ma rnyed do snyam mo de nas/ zam
277b7(brgyad stong): ze'i khye'u des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu nga la mis ni bya ba myed kyi 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig
277b8(brgyad stong): byed de der mya'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang dag ngal rgos na de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces bya ba dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
278a1(brgyad stong): dka' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang pa nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gi rnyed pa'i 'chog legs par rnyed do// bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
278a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang / sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ zam ze'i khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'ikhye'u
278a3(brgyad stong): lus 'di las khyod la gang 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su btang ba de nga la byin cig de
278a4(brgyad stong): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mtshon rnon po chos thogs nas/ lag pa g.yas po phug ste khrag zags so// brla g.yas pa sha med par byas nas rus gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo
278a5(brgyad stong): zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla sha med par btogs nas/ rus pa gtso/ ga tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi
278a6(brgyad stong): bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste/ dri'o snyam ste byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid
278a7(brgyad stong): 'di lta bu'i na cha byed/ khrag dang rus pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/ rtag tu dus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa/ 
278a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / 
278b1(brgyad stong): kha dang rkang yang btsongs te/ rigs kyi bu de la bkur bstir bya bar 'dod pa dang / khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de gang la ngas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
278b2(brgyad stong): dang thabs mkhas pa dag bston par 'gyur te/ de la ngas bslabs na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gri kha dog lta bu yang thob
278b3(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / bta
278b4(brgyad stong): bsgoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par ri gra pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang thob par 'gyung / mngon par shes pa lnga dang+ge/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis/ 
278b5(brgyad stong): mi khyab pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ba dang / shes rab rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes/ 
278b6(brgyad stong): kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis sems can thams cad la kur tu bgo bar bya ba'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po cha yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dab ga bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems
278b7(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos brgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo 'char te/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir snang bskal pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
278b8(brgyad stong): lus yongs su btang bar bya ba yin na/ gcig lta ci smos te/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag brgya cher yongs su rjod pa ni ngo 'char te/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
279a1(brgyad stong): chos 'phags la bkur bstir bya ba'i gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bye du brgya'am dang dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ phreng ba 'am byug pa 'am phye ma 'am/ gos sa
279a2(brgyad stong): gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod la sbyin gyis/ bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ kho mo yang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong la
279a3(brgyad stong): bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu 'di la sa de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'irtsa ba skrun pa bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin phra ze'i khe'u ma byed de mi snang bar byas nas bdag nyid lus byang chub / 
279a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras darigs kyi bu de ltar mi dam la brtan pa ni legs so lags so// 'di da lta bu'i chos 'dad pas / sngon gi de bzhin gshegs pa dag / 
279a5(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang // sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
279a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu li snying dang khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gis bya ba med kyis/ nga khyod sad pa'i phyir 'ongs kyis rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mchog rtsol cig rigs kyi
279a7(brgyad stong): bu khyod la mchog ji lta bu zhig sbyin par bya/ rtag tu dus smras pa/ brgya byin sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa bdag la rtsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni nga 'i yul du gyur pa ma yin te/ yul 'di ni
279a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyi/ mchog gzhan stsol cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu dus/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la ni/ lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis
279b1(brgyad stong): shig ka lha'i dbang po bdag nyid kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
279b2(brgyad stong): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung stan cing bdag gi lkog pa'i bsam pa g.yo ba med par mkhyen ce na/ bden pa rnying bden pa 'i tshig des bdag gi sus sngon bzhin du gyur cig ces byas pa dang / skad cig
279b3(brgyad stong): yud tsam thang cig de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mthu' dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dge bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus sngon gyi lus bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin
279b4(brgyad stong): slebs pa med par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du la len glan par spobs pa ma skyes nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur pa to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279b5(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu dus pa 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ 9/ kho mo'i khyim gang na yod pa der dong ngo // kho mo'ipha ma las nor blang/ nyes te/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mchod par bya ba dang / 
279b6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dbya' chen po chos 'phags de la yang bkur stor bya ba sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dang tshong dpon gyi bu ma de 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim gal ba der dngango // 
279b7(brgyad stong): de nas tshang dpon kyi bu mo de bdag gi khyim du phyin nas/ pa ma la 'di skad ces smras so// mab yum gser gyi dang dngus dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug ma
279b8(brgyad stong): bye sa dpa gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba da dang / rom mo'i rtswa byang mang po dag bdag la stsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed kyis stsal pa'i gsog mo lnga brgya po 'di dag dang lhan cig dge bar stsol / byang chub
280a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te/ byang chub sos dpal sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du 'chi'o// yang bdag cag la chos ston par 'gyur/ 
280a2(brgyad stong): nas bu mo des kyi phya mA'i bu mo la 'di skad ces gsol to// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dude su zhig bu mo rigs kyi phreng da lta ga la 'dug/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu re ni nga la'o// 
280a3(brgyad stong): sgoHbang gi sku drung ni 'chis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ni 'di lta se/ seMs can thas cad 'khor ba'i sdug sA le dpag tu ma 'chis
280a4(brgyad stong): khrus thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas des chos kyi slad du bdag nyid chongs la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal/ 'pha gas pa byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po chos 'phag
280a5(brgyad stong): ngab bgyi bre 'tshal no// de lus nyo ba su yang ma rnyed de/ de/ sdug sbal bzhi yid mi dad nas mi dga' bar sos shing 'chos te/ des pa ni dus 'tsho ba bar 'dod na lus nyo ba ma rnyed do// 
280a6(brgyad stong): zhes bgyis pa dang / brgya byin bro za'i khye'u gzugs skur// des 'di skad du khyod gang gi khyim sus yochongs par 'dod 'gyis pas/ rag tu tudas gas rab kyi pha tshul tu phyin pa la mchod pa
280a7(brgyad stong): khya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya ba dang / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos nas ni de las rag pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro// 
280a8(brgyad stong): zhes bgyis pa/ brgya byin bre ze'i khye'u gzugasu sgyur bas 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni dam+b+hi 'dod/ nga mchod basbyin zhig byed pa des mi 'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang ngag dgos
280b1(brgyad stong): zhas bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yi ma bsad pa de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes smras so pa dang / mtshon non po thogs te bdag gi lag pa phug su phrag gzags/ rA sha togs nas rus pa gcong su
280b2(brgyad stong): song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug sa rus dang nang byin no snya nas/ de ni khrag zags pa bdag khang pa'i yang thog na mchis par mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid do// mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur bdag nyid
280b3(brgyad stong): kha na tsha dag bgyi snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag zags pa 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad mchi ste/ bram ze'i khye'u
280b4(brgyad stong): 'dil snying dang/ khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang byin no// de ci'i phyir zhen don dbul te/ bal nar gzhan gyi yang med do// bdag gi sa khyod la nor gyis cig bya ba nas 'gyis pas
280b5(brgyad stong): des bdag la 'di skad du 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa d+maro/ byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur bsi bya'o/ 
280b6(brgyad stong): zhes 'acos nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad bgyis/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rnaM pa 'am/ sayon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur// res bdag la 'das
280b7(brgyad stong): du rjengs rgyas kyi man tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i chos rnams nga las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon
280b8(brgyad stong): ri na thosam gyis myi khyab pa de dag zos nas bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu 'gu ba chen po skyes nas/ 'di snyam du bgyid de rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'dri lta bu'i gnas la spro bar bgyid pa ni shin tu bka' ba 'gyid ba ste/ 
281a1(brgyad stong): ngo 'char to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang yongs su btong na/ bdag cag sA longs spyod pargya chen po dag yod ba'i phyir/ mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas
281a2(brgyad stong): sbyang ci'i phyir smon lam mi btab snyam nas/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad smras so sharigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na cha dag ma byed cig/ khyod 'dod pa bdag gis 'phags
281a3(brgyad stong): mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba'i nor mang po dag khyod la sbyin no// bdag dang khyod nyid dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
281a4(brgyad stong): 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongs su rjod pa'/ di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa dag bdag gis
281a5(brgyad stong): kyang thob par bgyi'o// zhes bgyi na yab yum nor gi phung po chen po bdag la sbal du gsol// bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mchod
281a6(brgyad stong): bar bgyi'o// / bam po// / de nas bu mau de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i bka
281a7(brgyad stong): pa'i gnas dag / khyod kyis bstan pa lags na/ chos de dag ni gcig tu khyab par bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba thob par
281a8(brgyad stong): byed pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir de lta bu'i bka' ba'i gnas la spro bar byed na/ khyod nges kyis gnang gyis bu mo de kyang khrod dang lhan cig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
281b1(brgyad stong): lha zhing mchod du nged kyang 'gro// deng 'gro ba'i skabs phye tsog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'dod pa dang / bkur stor bya ba'i phyir chas te/ pha ma la 'di skad ces
281b2(brgyad stong): smras su/ bdag ni dge ba'i chos gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyi'o// de nas tshong dpon gi bu mo des shing rta la brgya yang rkyen gyis rkyen/ bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang brgyan gyis brgyan no// brgyan gyis brgyan
281b3(brgyad stong): ni me tog la nyig dus sna tshogs pa thag susu/ bdug pa dang / blos dang / 'bring ba dang / zug pa dang / byes dang / gas dang / rgyal macan dang / ba dan dag thogs/ gser dang / dngus kyi ma
281b4(brgyad stong): rin bu che sna tshogs rnam pas dang pa dag kyang thogs te/ baban ba dang / bdung ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang mang du 'gung nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems da
281b5(brgyad stong): rkyen pa rtag tu du dang shing tu gcig tu zhugs te/ bum lnga brgya shing ta lnga brgya'i mang du zhugs pa// de dag gis bskor rdzi gyi mdu du 'dang nas/ pha ma la stsogs pa 'khor mang po sha
281b6(brgyad stong): phyogs ga la ba~M de logs su dong ste/ mthar gyis song ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rtag tu dus rgyang ring mo zhig nas grong khyer spos ldan rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba lhan
281b7(brgyad stong): 'du bas da mu gnyis yod pa'i 'byod cing mang po bdeb ma lags pami dang skye ba mang pos gang rje spong bar gi srang gnas zhing / mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis nimar bris pa
282a1(brgyad stong): bzhin du bdams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi nga ba dang / bar bar dag tu zab pa gtams pa/ legs par byas pa ngag mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi mngon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
282a2(brgyad stong): 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong phrag du mas bskor te/ mdun du bdar zhing chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa
282a3(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan dang po kha tse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag 'di shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du/ byang chub sems

282a8(brgyad stong): dngul las byas bya bzhi yang phyogs bzhir yang phyo byas pa zhir btags te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir// ma ka ru nag po 'ab zhig gis bdug par byed do// khang bu ceg / 
282b1(brgyad stong): ba de'i dbus su rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bzhi bcugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgom pa ni bzhag nas ram de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gyi khru lags bam la/ bye du brgya zhun mas bris pa bcug ste

285a5(brgyad stong): stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mchod par byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rtse chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur stir byas/ byang chub

285a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol shing 'grog dgon par
285a8(brgyad stong): phyin pa na/ sgra thos pa rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba de'i logs su mchis nas
285b1(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis sgra de la ji srid mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan zhing rnyed par 'gyur ma dris so snyam ste/ de bdag yid mi bde zhing shin bdung bar gyur
285b2(brgyad stong): nas sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu bdud bas zas la sems pa yang ma byung ste/ gzhan du na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ab zhig yid la bgyis te/ ci srid cig
285b3(brgyad stong): tu mchi bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du sa phyin pa 'di su las mnyan par brnyed par 'gyur sgra de las ma dris so// snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig/ 
285b4(brgyad stong): 'byung ste/ de 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tsha da lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab
285b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa mthong bar 'ong ngo // zhes gsung sa te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'a/ de thos nas/ ji ltar gdams pa bzhin du/ shar phyogs
285b6(brgyad stong): gal ba de legs su zhugs te 'chis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes te/ dper na dge slong bsam tan dang po la zhus
285b7(brgyad stong): ba bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba deng rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur pa te/ sa phyogs de nam skyod par khyod las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so// de nyan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur
285b8(brgyad stong): bdag den mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dbugs dpung ba mdzad de// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni/ shes
286a1(brgyad stong): ga / rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di las gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la zhin
286a2(brgyad stong): du legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snya ma/ 
286a3(brgyad stong): de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni sngon gyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs so/ 
286a4(brgyad stong): pa la shin tu bslab pa la gnas te// de de bzhin gshegs pa/ de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du/ bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ rigs kyi
286a5(brgyad stong): bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'dri na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa 'tshal

286a8(brgyad stong): dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la ni 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba med de/

290b2(brgyad stong): shing rta lde brgya de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tu rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu rtag tu dul byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
290b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang / nyi ma yang nub par gyu 'ad to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di
290b4(brgyad stong): ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa 'am nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi cha la 'di ni ma legs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston pa'i phyir ma byung gi bar
290b5(brgyad stong): rdodze du 'dug gam 'greng ngam/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o// snyam mo// de nas byang chub sem/ sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun gi bar du ring
290b6(brgyad stong): nge 'dzin cig la goms par zhugs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen nga'i ting nge 'dzind grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams mkhas pa las byung
290b7(brgyad stong): bal gnas par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tu du yang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byang gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byang/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyid
290b8(brgyad stong): khabs byung ba rol rnam pa ma skyes te / gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar 'gyur ba bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags khrig
291a1(brgyad stong): la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri ba shams nas bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab gdab legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor te
291a2(brgyad stong): sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa rab tu bston par 'gyur ba/ der legs par byug par
291a3(brgyad stong): bya'o snyam mo tshong dpon gi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mi lnga brgya tsam yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'das
291a4(brgyad stong): par byed de/ bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'ju/ dag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag du dus lha'i sgra de thos te/ byang chub sems
291a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhag za dun na ting nge 'dzin de las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ chos ston par 'gyur ro// zhes dra
291a6(brgyad stong): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du lha'i sgra de thos pa dang dga' 'gu yid rangs te/ rab tu 'gu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon
291a7(brgyad stong): gi bu mo la stsogs te bu mo lnga brgya dang nas phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin mo che thams/ cad kyis spar bar bsham mo// de nas bud med de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de stan pa
291b1(brgyad stong): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba spyod bting rjo na de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus der nag chag 'dab
291b2(brgyad stong): par 'dod na pang bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi sdang bar byas nas/ ji nas byang chub sem se/ par sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du chu ma rnyed nas/ ming mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ 
291b3(brgyad stong): sems gzhan dur 'gyur ba dang / dge pa'i yul nub tur 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa mi dres par bya ba'i byar du de dag kyi snang bar byas nas/ bud du nu ba a na chung mdad do// dedes byang chub ses
291b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis su phyogs 'di chag tshig bdab po de ci'i phyir zhen/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gi khams
291b5(brgyad stong): mas cad 'di nas kyang nas byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po ches 'phags kyi lus la log tu mi rgyun gsus 'do mi ma zar 'jig pa 'dis ji zhig tu
291b6(brgyad stong): badrug gi lus 'di sa bu bya ba la zhig pa ni tha'i/ rus pa skyed pa'i bya ba sa/ 'dod pa'i phyir 'di du pa'i bunis 'khor ba dag na bdag gisus brgya stong ma zo dalta bu'i gnas su zhig nga
291b7(brgyad stong): sangs rung ngogs so / donas byang chub sems rapa'i sems dpa' chen po rtag su dus mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi sus kun tu phug gi khrag gis sa phyogs pa
291b8(brgyad stong): yug tu chag chug btab zo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la spogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyis kya
292a1(brgyad stong): rin po tshe thams cad kyis smras pa lnga rnams so// de nas bu mo re dag rang rang gi bla gos thang de/ stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas/ chos som
292a2(brgyad stong): bar gyur pa der ting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs de chag chag btab par 'dod pa na/ bdud sdig can gyis nu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ byang chub
292a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu chum rnyod nas/ yang mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge pa'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur la dang / mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par
292a4(brgyad stong): bya ba'i phyir/ nu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/ kun tu chu btsas na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ga tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag gi
292a5(brgyad stong): sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab po// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa gas 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus pa
292a6(brgyad stong): thog na mi chung ma/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'das kyi nag rgya/ bdag gi lus 'drin bu byab la rig pa mi d+ga re/ nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i bzhis lakhor ba dag na/ ngan
292a7(brgyad stong): gi lus rgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mtshon rnon po thosags te/ bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag
292a8(brgyad stong): sa ma rtsegs kho ma sug mam cag pas so// byang chu m-i sa dpa' semapa pa chen po rtog sa su thong ba/ rta bye gsu ma phregs pa/ sum na bye dag 'ams pa kyis byang batshan noms
292b1(brgyad stong): drungs te/ rang rang gisus phug nas/ rang rang gi khrag gis su phyogs de chag chag gang ba ste/ gang de dag la bdud sdig can gis bar chad bya ba'i grags brnyed par ma gyur pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
292b2(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu du dang / shu mo de dag sems gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de nas wa'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ci tsam du ches 'dod pa dang
292b3(brgyad stong): ci tsam du yid dam la rten pa dang / ci tsam du go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 
292b4(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can rnams thar par bya'o// snyam du lhag pa'i bas
292b5(brgyad stong): pa la klags pa ni dmamed / sum du sems nas lta dbang ba rgya sbyin gyis khrag de dag thams cad lta'i cin tan gyi nu byin gyis brlabs so// lngacom tan gyi na sa phre ngas pa
292b6(brgyad stong): skad ce lta // rigs kyi pa legs pa/ segs byed bya ca 'das pa ma byas mi kyang po/ khyong kyis chos 'dod pa dang / nas yongs su chos pa tha med pa'o// ngas tsas bur shing bzhi gzhin kyi
292b7(brgyad stong): kyin pa 'jug dang rdzogs me sa rgyas dngon pa kyang pa rgyal pa 'dis sa nga/ na chub 'di tho pa 'angs thas ma gas
293a1(brgyad stong): yang dag bur sgrubs so// nas byang chub sems dpa' sems pa rten blo nas tu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang byang chub sems de sems sa mamam 'basas kyi na na na
293a2(brgyad stong): phyogs byed phyag dar ni byis chag chag ni btan/ bdag gis ma rtog gang dag gos su phyogs rtor bar bya dang / byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po chos 'grags rlom ldan gyu
293a3(brgyad stong): me tog de gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam du sems so// de na su lce'i dbyang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i mo chog kyi nga rob de dge
293a4(brgyad stong): longam/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag me tog bkram par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos sngon yin ming ma ge'i khri lnga 'dun pa la yang gtan cig ces

293a7(brgyad stong): tu / byang chub semam dang sems dbu chen po ches 'a'ags thong sa lag tu 'angs te/ / ma gtan dang kyis rtsolas can mthugs sngon thog tu med byed pa pa
293b1(brgyad stong): de lta bu thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnye ba nyid
293b2(brgyad stong): chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad gsol ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsol ba med pa nyid// chos thams cad rlom po
293b3(brgyad stong): med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid de// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rolab tu phyin med khengs pa med pa nyid do// dri'i chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid
293b4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa su med pa nyid do// chos sna thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/ bras rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

293b6(brgyad stong): med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid pas ni ye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sngo tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' jig
293b7(brgyad stong): meng pa nyid bsre/ shes rab kyi pa'i sang tu phyin pa rtog tu mod pa nyid do/ gzugs su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi sa rom tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid/ de bzhin du nur ba dang / 'du shes dang bung byed das
293b8(brgyad stong): rnam tha mashes pa su 'du ba byed pa pa ni sa makyo 'om tu byin pa su med pa byed do// bkyimams su med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pa'i mang du phyin pa su med pa nyid dro// de bzhin du chu'i bur / ma lam gro / 
296a1(brgyad stong): rlung gi khams su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha ro song tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid
